question_text: When did the creation event occur for service order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH  (task:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})-[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)-[:RelatingProcess]->(event:IfcEvent)
RETURN event.EventOccurenceTime AS CreationTimestamp

question_text: Do we have any buildings recorded in the data?
reference_answer:
MATCH (b:IfcBuilding)
RETURN count(b) > 0 AS BuildingsExist

question_text: What is the formula structure for what is paid to labors?
reference_answer:
MATCH (:IfcCostItem)-[:HasCostValue]->(totalpaid:IfcCostValue {Name:"TotalPaid"})-[:HasComponents]->(laborCost:IfcCostValue {Name: "LaborCost"})
MATCH (laborCost)-[:HasComponents]->(operand:IfcCostValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (operand)-[:HasComponents]->(leaf:IfcCostValue)
RETURN DISTINCT
  laborCost.Name AS RootName,
  laborCost.ArithmeticOperator AS RootOperator,
  operand.Name AS OperandName,
  operand.ArithmeticOperator AS OperandOperator,
  leaf.Name AS LeafOperandName

question_text: Are there any <SystemStatus> tasks in floor <STOREY_ID> handled by Tinsmiths?
reference_answer:
MATCH (plumbers:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Tinsmiths"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(status:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "SystemStatus"})
WHERE status.NominalValue CONTAINS "<SystemStatus>"

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey {Name: "<STOREY_ID>"})

RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT task) > 0 AS Exists

question_text: Which floor has the most service orders?
reference_answer:
MATCH (storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)

RETURN storey.Name AS StoreyName, count(task) AS WorkOrderCount
ORDER BY WorkOrderCount DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: Give the total charged for the work order with number <WORK_ORDER_ID>.
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(assignToSchedule:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(assignItems:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalCharged"})

RETURN SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalChargedAmount

question_text: What is the basic start date of work order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
RETURN tt.EarlyStart

question_text: Which floors had tasks completed before March 1, 2023?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(time:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE date(time.ScheduleFinish) < date("2023-03-01")

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)

RETURN DISTINCT storey.Name AS StoreyName

question_text: Looking at all billing lines for WO <WORK_ORDER_ID>, what is the most recent date of work execution?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (ci)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"})

RETURN max(date(prop.NominalValue)) AS LatestWorkDate

question_text: What are the work center labels used to organize tasks in this system?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wcGroup:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Work Centers"})
      -[:HasReferences]->(category:IfcClassificationReference)
RETURN category.Name

question_text: How is the IfcTask entity is connected to IfcTaskTime?
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcTask -[:TaskTime]-> IfcTaskTime" AS Path

question_text: List all chargeout rates above $120 recorded in 2022.
reference_answer:
MATCH (cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "ChargeoutRate"})
WHERE cv.AppliedValue > 120

MATCH (cv)-[:IsCostValueOf]->(item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(psv:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})
WHERE date(psv.NominalValue).year = 2022

RETURN DISTINCT cv.AppliedValue AS ChargeoutRate, psv.NominalValue AS BillingDate

question_text: What is the first name of the person whose last name is <FAMILY_NAME> ?

MATCH (p:IfcPerson {FamilyName: "<FAMILY_NAME>"})
RETURN p.GivenName

question_text: How is an IfcPropertySet connected to its IfcPropertySingleValues?
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcPropertySet -[:HasProperties]-> IfcPropertySingleValue" AS Path

question_text: What is the status of work order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
RETURN wo.Status

question_text: What’s the overall paid cost recorded for task <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(assignToSchedule:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(assignItems:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})

RETURN SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalPaidAmount

question_text: Identify Organizations in <BUILDING_ID> whose average 'TotalPaid' for 'HVAC and AC' tasks exceeds the global average cost for all HVAC tasks in that building. Return the Organization Name, their Average Cost, and the Building's Average Cost.
reference_answer:
CALL {
    MATCH (cat:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "HVAC and AC"})
          -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
          -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(relClass:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
          -[:RelatedObjects]->(t:IfcTask)
    MATCH (t)-[:OperatesOn]->(relProc:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
          -[:RelatedObjects]->(s:IfcSpace)
          -[:Decomposes]->(relAgg1:IfcRelAggregates)
          -[:RelatingObject]->(st:IfcBuildingStorey)
          -[:Decomposes]->(relAgg2:IfcRelAggregates)
          -[:RelatingObject]->(b:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})
    MATCH (t)-[:HasAssignments]->(relControl:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
          -[:RelatingControl]->(sched:IfcCostSchedule)
          -[:Controls]->(relControl2:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
          -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem)
          -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})
    RETURN avg(cv.AppliedValue) AS GlobalAvg
}

MATCH (cat2:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "HVAC and AC"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf2:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(relClass2:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)-[:IsRelatedBy]->(relActor:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(act:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(pno:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:TheOrganization]->(org:IfcOrganization)

MATCH (task)-[:OperatesOn]->(relProc2:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(relAgg3:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(relAgg4:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(b2:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(relControl3:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(sched2:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(relControl4:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv2:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})

WITH org, avg(cv2.AppliedValue) AS OrgAvg, GlobalAvg
WHERE OrgAvg > GlobalAvg
RETURN org.Name AS ExpensiveOrg, OrgAvg, GlobalAvg

question_text: What is the average number of hours (for billings) across all entries?
reference_answer:
MATCH (value:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})
RETURN AVG(value.AppliedValue) AS AvgHours

question_text: List all rooms in first floors where service orders started more than 20 days after issuance.
reference_answer:
MATCH (event:IfcEvent)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND event.EventOccurenceTime IS NOT NULL

WITH task, event, duration.between(date(event.EventOccurenceTime), date(tt.ScheduleStart)).days AS delay
WHERE delay > 20

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey {Name: <STOREY_ID>})


RETURN DISTINCT space.Name AS Room, storey.Name AS Storey, delay AS Delay

question_text: What different pay rates appear in WO <WORK_ORDER_ID>’s billing data?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(assignToSchedule:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(assignItems:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "PayRate"})

RETURN DISTINCT cv.AppliedValue AS PayRate
ORDER BY PayRate

question_text: Which work centers are responsible for work order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})-[:HasAssociations]->(assoc:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)-[:RelatingClassification]->(ref:IfcClassificationReference)-[:ReferencedSource]->(systems:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Work Centers"})
RETURN DISTINCT ref.Name

question_text: What is the assigned work center for the service order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})-[:HasAssociations]->(assoc:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)-[:RelatingClassification]->(ref:IfcClassificationReference)-[:ReferencedSource]->(systems:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Work Centers"})
RETURN DISTINCT ref.Name

question_text: Do any spaces have multiple overlapping tasks with conflicting system statuses?
reference_answer:
MATCH (space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task1:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(tt1:IfcTaskTime),
      (space)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task2:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(tt2:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE task1 <> task2
  AND date(tt1.ScheduleStart) <= date(tt2.ScheduleFinish)
  AND date(tt2.ScheduleStart) <= date(tt1.ScheduleFinish)
  AND id(task1) < id(task2)

MATCH (task1)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop1:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE prop1.Name = "SystemStatus"

MATCH (task2)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop2:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE prop2.Name = "SystemStatus" AND prop1.NominalValue <> prop2.NominalValue

RETURN DISTINCT space.Name AS SpaceName, task1.Identification AS TaskA, task2.Identification AS TaskB, prop1.NominalValue AS StatusA, prop2.NominalValue AS StatusB

question_text: Which service orders fall into the caretakers category?
reference_answer:
MATCH (classification:IfcClassificationReference)
WHERE toLower(classification.Name) = "caretakers"
MATCH (classification)-[:HasReferences*0..]->(ref:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(wo:IfcTask)
RETURN DISTINCT wo.Identification

question_text: Give me the total number of distinct floors across all buildings.
reference_answer:
MATCH (s:IfcBuildingStorey)
RETURN count(DISTINCT s) AS NumberOfStoreys

question_text: Under Actions and Issues branch, what are the most granular categories available?
reference_answer:
MATCH (root:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Actions And Issues"})
      -[:HasReferences]->(mid:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:HasReferences]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
RETURN DISTINCT leaf.Name

question_text: Identify high-value tasks in <BUILDING_ID> where the profit margin is less than $50, despite the Total Charged being greater than $200. Return the Task ID and the calculated Margin.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
MATCH (task)-[:OperatesOn]->(relProc:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(relAgg1:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(relAgg2:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(b:IfcBuilding {Name: <BUILDING_ID>})

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(relControl:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(sched:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(relControl2:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (item)-[:HasCostValue]->(cvCharged:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalCharged"})
MATCH (item)-[:HasCostValue]->(cvPaid:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})

WITH task, cvCharged.AppliedValue AS Revenue, cvPaid.AppliedValue AS Cost
WHERE Revenue > 0 AND (Revenue - Cost) < 5000

RETURN task.Identification AS TaskID, (Revenue - Cost) AS LowMargin

question_text: What is the average delay between work and billing for tasks classified under power and shutdown requests?
reference_answer:
MATCH (category:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Power and Shutdown Requests"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
RETURN round(avg(delay.days), 1) AS AvgBillingDelayForRemediation

question_text: Show me the work orders associated with the <STOREY_ID> floor in building <BUILDING_ID>.
reference_answer:
MATCH (building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey {Name: <STOREY_ID>})
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)

RETURN task.Identification AS WorkOrderId

question_text: Were there any completed service orders with a missing end date?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE prop.Name = "SystemStatus" AND prop.NominalValue = "<SystemStatus>"

MATCH (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleFinish IS NULL

RETURN COUNT(task) AS NumCompletedWithMissingEndDate

question_text: documentation and reporting issues is part of which classification group?
reference_answer:
MATCH (child:IfcClassificationReference)-[:ReferencedSource]->(parent:IfcClassificationReference)
WHERE toLower(child.Name) = "documentation and reporting"
RETURN parent.Name

question_text: Is order <WORK_ORDER_ID> classified as an emergency?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE prop.Name = "Priority"
RETURN toUpper(prop.NominalValue) = "<PRIORITY_LABEL>" AS IsEmergencyPriority

question_text: Where does lighting systems fall in the classification hierarchy?
reference_answer:
MATCH (group:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:HasReferences]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
WHERE toLower(leaf.Name) = "lighting systems"
RETURN DISTINCT group.Name AS ClassificationGroup

question_text: Calculate the total billable value for tasks managed by <GIVEN_NAME> <FAMILY_NAME> within building <BUILDING_ID>.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(person:IfcPerson)
WHERE person.GivenName = "<GIVEN_NAME>" AND person.FamilyName = "<FAMILY_NAME>"

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalCharged"})

RETURN SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalCharged

question_text: What is the path from a space to its associated service order?
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcSpace -[:HasAssignments]-> IfcRelAssignsToProcess -[:RelatingProcess]-> IfcTask" AS Path

question_text: What is the path from an IfcEvent to the associated IfcTask?
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcActor -[:TheActor]-> IfcPersonAndOrganization -[:ThePerson]-> IfcPerson" AS Path

question_text: What is the last name of the planner with ID <PERSON_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (p:IfcPerson {Identification: "<PERSON_ID>"})
RETURN p.FamilyName

question_text: Which IFC entity stores custom property definitions?
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcCostItem" AS Entity

question_text: Which rooms had the slowest average payment processing time in 2022?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})
WHERE toString(wd.NominalValue) STARTS WITH "2022"

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)

WITH space.Name AS Room, duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
RETURN Room, round(avg(delay.days), 1) AS AvgDelayDays
ORDER BY AvgDelayDays DESC
LIMIT 10

question_text: Calculate the total labor hours associated with planner <PERSON_ID> for tasks located in building <BUILDING_ID>.

      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(person:IfcPerson {Identification: "<PERSON_ID>"})

      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)

      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)
MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)

question_text: Which planners assigned the most tasks to shift engineers in 2022?
reference_answer:
MATCH (classification:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Shift Engineers"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(time:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE date(time.ScheduleStart).year = 2022

MATCH (task)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(person:IfcPerson)

RETURN 
  person.GivenName + " " + person.FamilyName AS PlannerName,
  COUNT(DISTINCT task) AS TaskCount
ORDER BY TaskCount DESC
LIMIT 5

question_text: Are there any tasks that lasted more than 25 days?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(time:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE time.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND time.ScheduleFinish IS NOT NULL

WITH task, duration.between(date(time.ScheduleStart), date(time.ScheduleFinish)).days AS durationDays
WHERE durationDays > 25
RETURN task.Identification AS WorkOrderID, durationDays

question_text: How many cost lines are recorded under work order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

RETURN COUNT(costItem) AS CostLineCount

question_text: What is the average labor cost per task in building <BUILDING_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})

RETURN avg(cv.AppliedValue) AS AvgLaborCostPerTask

question_text: List the specific cost values (e.g., pay or duration) connected to IfcCostItem.
reference_answer:
MATCH (ci:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue)
RETURN DISTINCT cv.Name AS CostValueType

question_text: What building has the most <ORDERTYPE> order type?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "OrderType"})
WHERE prop.NominalValue = "<ORDERTYPE>"

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding)

RETURN building.Name AS BuildingName, COUNT(*) AS MINVTaskCount
ORDER BY MINVTaskCount DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: What is the average shift premium per billing record?
reference_answer:
MATCH (value:IfcCostValue {Name: "ShiftPremium"})
RETURN AVG(value.AppliedValue) AS AvgShiftPremium

question_text: How long does it typically take to process payment after a task is executed?
reference_answer:
MATCH (costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH date(wd.NominalValue) AS workDate, date(bd.NominalValue) AS billingDate
WITH duration.inDays(workDate, billingDate) AS delay
RETURN avg(delay.days) AS AvgDelayInDays

question_text: How is a building related to its floors in the IFC structure?
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcBuilding -[:IsDecomposedBy]-> IfcRelAggregates -[:RelatedObjects]-> IfcBuildingStorey" AS Path

question_text: Find all Organizations (Contractors) that have performed 'HVAC and AC' tasks in <BUILDING_ID> where the tasks took more than 20 hours and the total paid amount was more than 2000$. Return the Organization Name and the count of such tasks.
reference_answer:
MATCH (cat:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "HVAC and AC"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)-[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:TheOrganization]->(org:IfcOrganization)

MATCH (task)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(b:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (item)-[:HasCostValue]->(cvPaid:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})
MATCH (item)-[:HasCostValue]->(cvHours:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

WHERE cvPaid.AppliedValue > 2000 AND cvHours.AppliedValue > 20

RETURN org.Name AS Organization, count(task) AS TaskCount

question_text: Is there any WO that had billing before its scheduled start?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE bd.Name = "BillingDate" AND bd.NominalValue IS NOT NULL

WITH task, date(tt.ScheduleStart) AS schedStart, date(bd.NominalValue) AS billingDate
WHERE billingDate < schedStart
RETURN COUNT(task) > 0 AS BillingBeforeScheduleStart

question_text: Did HelpdeskSubmission tasks use DistributionChannel <DistributionChannel> more in 2023 or 2022?
reference_answer:
MATCH (event:IfcEvent {UserDefinedEventTriggerType: "HelpdeskSubmission"})
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

MATCH (task)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(dc:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "DistributionChannel"})
WHERE toFloat(dc.NominalValue) = <DistributionChannel>

WITH tt.ScheduleStart AS schedDate
WITH 
  CASE 
    WHEN schedDate.year = 2022 THEN "2022"
    WHEN schedDate.year = 2023 THEN "2023"
    ELSE "Other"
  END AS Year
RETURN Year, count(*) AS NumChannel20Tasks
ORDER BY Year

question_text: Which classification labels is the WO <WORK_ORDER_ID> associated with?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})-[:HasAssociations]->(assoc:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)-[:RelatingClassification]->(ref:IfcClassificationReference)
RETURN ref.Name

question_text: Which IFC entity holds the individual values inside an IfcPropertySet?
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcPropertySingleValue" AS Entity

question_text: What is the maximum charged amount?
reference_answer:
MATCH (value:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalCharged"})
RETURN MAX(value.AppliedValue) AS MaxTotalCharged

question_text: List all building floors.
reference_answer:
MATCH (s:IfcBuildingStorey)
RETURN s.Name AS StoreyNam
ORDER BY s.Name

question_text: What is the min pay rate applied?
reference_answer:
MATCH (value:IfcCostValue {Name: "PayRate"})
RETURN MIN(value.AppliedValue) AS MinPayRate

question_text: List the IDs of actors who maintained a 100% compliance rate with the 7-day billing turnaround target.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
  -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
  -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
  -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
  -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
  -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
  -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
        (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

MATCH (task)-[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
  -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
  -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
  -[:ThePerson]->(planner:IfcPerson)

WITH planner.Identification AS PlannerID,
     duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
WITH PlannerID, collect(delay.days) AS Delays
WITH PlannerID, Delays
WHERE all(d IN Delays WHERE d <= 7)

WITH collect({PlannerID: PlannerID, Count: size(Delays)}) AS Results
RETURN size(Results) > 0 AS Exists, Results

question_text: What is the full amount charged to work order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(assignToSchedule:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(assignItems:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalCharged"})

RETURN SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalChargedAmount

question_text: What is the short text of work order <WORK_ORDER_ID> ?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
RETURN wo.Name

question_text: Verify if the service order <WORK_ORDER_ID> is linked to the facility <BUILDING_ID>.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

RETURN COUNT(building) > 0 AS IsAssignedToBuilding<BUILDING_ID>

question_text: Which cost items lack a corresponding billing date?
reference_answer:
MATCH (item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE prop.Name = "BillingDate" AND prop.NominalValue IS NULL
RETURN item.Identification AS CostItemID, item.Name AS CostItemName

question_text: Report all instances where distinct tasks sharing the same classification reference were executed on the same building storey within a 1-day window.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task1:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(tt1:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt1.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

MATCH (task2:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(tt2:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt2.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND task1 <> task2


MATCH (task1)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)-[:RelatedObjects]->(space1:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)-[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)

MATCH (task2)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)-[:RelatedObjects]->(space2:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)-[:RelatingObject]->(storey)


MATCH (task1)-[:HasAssociations]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)-[:RelatingClassification]->(class1:IfcClassificationReference)
MATCH (task2)-[:HasAssociations]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)-[:RelatingClassification]->(class2:IfcClassificationReference)

WHERE class1.Name = class2.Name


AND abs(duration.inDays(date(tt1.ScheduleStart), date(tt2.ScheduleStart)).days) <= 1

RETURN DISTINCT storey.Name AS Storey,
       class1.Name AS Classification,
       task1.Identification AS TaskA,
       task2.Identification AS TaskB,
       tt1.ScheduleStart AS StartA,
       tt2.ScheduleStart AS StartB
ORDER BY Storey, StartA

question_text: Identify rooms on the first floor that had tasks with a start delay of over 30 days from their issuance date.
reference_answer:
MATCH (event:IfcEvent)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND event.EventOccurenceTime IS NOT NULL

WITH task, event, duration.between(date(event.EventOccurenceTime), date(tt.ScheduleStart)).days AS delay
WHERE delay > 30

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey {Name: <STOREY_ID>})


RETURN DISTINCT space.Name AS Room, storey.Name AS Storey, delay AS Delay

question_text: How long, on average, does it take for a work order to be scheduled after issuance?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(event:IfcEvent),
      (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE event.EventOccurenceTime IS NOT NULL AND tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

WITH duration.inDays(date(event.EventOccurenceTime), date(tt.ScheduleStart)).days AS delayDays
RETURN avg(delayDays) AS AvgSchedulingDelay

question_text: Calculate the percentage of completed tasks in building <BUILDING_ID> that were classified as Routine (priority).
reference_answer:
MATCH (space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

MATCH (space)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)
WHERE task.Status = "<TASK_STATUS>"

OPTIONAL MATCH (task)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(priority:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "Priority"})

WITH
  COUNT(*) AS totalCompleted,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN priority.NominalValue = "<PRIORITY_LABEL>" THEN 1 END) AS emergencyCount

RETURN 
  CASE WHEN totalCompleted = 0 THEN 0.0
       ELSE toFloat(emergencyCount) / totalCompleted * 100
  END AS EmergencyPercentage

question_text: What is the span of days between the first and last WorkDate in the billing data for WO <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (ci)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"})

WITH date(prop.NominalValue) AS wd
RETURN duration.between(min(wd), max(wd)).days AS WorkDateSpanInDays

question_text: Campus services fall under which broader category?
reference_answer:
MATCH (group:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:HasReferences]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
WHERE toLower(leaf.Name) = "campus services"
RETURN DISTINCT group.Name AS ClassificationGroup

question_text: List all spaces located on first floors.

MATCH (storey:IfcBuildingStorey {Name: <STOREY_ID>})
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)

RETURN space.Name AS SpaceName
ORDER BY SpaceName

question_text: What is the most common user status in tasks assigned to elevator mechanics in 2022?
reference_answer:
MATCH (class:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Elevator Mechanics"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(time:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE date(time.ScheduleStart).year = 2022

MATCH (task)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)

RETURN status.NominalValue AS UserStatus, COUNT(*) AS Frequency

question_text: List all floors of the building <BUILDING_ID>.

MATCH (building:IfcBuilding)
WHERE building.Name = "<BUILDING_ID>"
MATCH (building)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)

RETURN storey.Name AS StoreyName
ORDER BY StoreyName

question_text: Which top-level group does testing and assessment fall under?
reference_answer:
MATCH (child:IfcClassificationReference)-[:ReferencedSource]->(parent:IfcClassificationReference)-[:ReferencedSource]->(toplevelcategory:IfcClassificationReference)
WHERE toLower(child.Name) = "testing and assessment"
RETURN toplevelcategory.Name

question_text: Sum up the 'TotalPaid' values for all work orders in building <BUILDING_ID> where <GIVEN_NAME> <FAMILY_NAME> is the assigned actor.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(person:IfcPerson)
WHERE person.GivenName = "<GIVEN_NAME>" AND person.FamilyName = "<FAMILY_NAME>"

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})

RETURN SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalPaid

question_text: What are the most common distribution channels for HelpdeskSubmission-triggered WOs?
reference_answer:
MATCH (event:IfcEvent {UserDefinedEventTriggerType: "HelpdeskSubmission"})
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE prop.Name = "DistributionChannel"

RETURN prop.NominalValue AS DistributionChannel, count(DISTINCT task) AS NumTasks
ORDER BY NumTasks DESC

question_text: Identify the floor in building <BUILDING_ID> that contains the highest number of individual spaces.
reference_answer:
MATCH (building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)

RETURN storey.Name AS StoreyName, count(space) AS RoomCount
ORDER BY RoomCount DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: List all tasks from organization “<ORGANIZATION_NAME>” that exceeded $200 in total paid amount.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:TheOrganization]->(:IfcOrganization {Name: "<ORGANIZATION_NAME>"})

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue)
WHERE cv.Name = "TotalPaid"

WITH task, SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalPaidAmount
WHERE TotalPaidAmount > 200

RETURN task.Identification AS WorkOrderID, TotalPaidAmount
ORDER BY TotalPaidAmount DESC

question_text: MPG <PERSON_ID> last name?
reference_answer:
MATCH (p:IfcPerson {Identification: "<PERSON_ID>"})
RETURN p.FamilyName

question_text: For service orders triggered by HelpdeskSubmission, what is the average task duration?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(event:IfcEvent),
      (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE event.UserDefinedEventTriggerType = "HelpdeskSubmission"
  AND tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL
  AND tt.ScheduleFinish IS NOT NULL

WITH duration.inDays(date(tt.ScheduleStart), date(tt.ScheduleFinish)) AS taskDuration
RETURN avg(taskDuration) AS AvgDurationInDays

question_text: What percentage of 2021 tasks were performed by Electricians?
reference_answer:
MATCH (c:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Electricians"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart >= datetime("2021-01-01") AND tt.ScheduleStart < datetime("2022-01-01")

WITH COUNT(DISTINCT task) AS electricianTasks

MATCH (taskAll:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(ttAll:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE ttAll.ScheduleStart >= datetime("2021-01-01") AND ttAll.ScheduleStart < datetime("2022-01-01")

WITH electricianTasks, COUNT(DISTINCT taskAll) AS totalTasks
RETURN toFloat(electricianTasks) / totalTasks * 100 AS ElectricianPercentage

question_text: What is the formula structure fo total charges in billing?
reference_answer:
MATCH (:IfcCostItem)-[:HasCostValue]->(charged:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalCharged"})
MATCH (charged)-[:HasComponents]->(operand:IfcCostValue)
RETURN DISTINCT 
  charged.Name AS RootName,
  charged.ArithmeticOperator AS RootOperator,
  operand.Name AS OperandName

question_text: What classification category includes contractor access as a task?
reference_answer:
MATCH (child:IfcClassificationReference)-[:ReferencedSource]->(parent:IfcClassificationReference)
WHERE toLower(child.Name) = "contractor access"
RETURN parent.Name

question_text: Give me the recorded creation time of work order <WORK_ORDER_ID>.

MATCH  (task:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})-[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)-[:RelatingProcess]->(event:IfcEvent)
RETURN event.EventOccurenceTime AS CreationTimestamp

question_text: Which day of the week sees the most wo issuances across the entire dataset?
reference_answer:
MATCH (event:IfcEvent)-[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)-[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
WHERE EXISTS {MATCH (task)-[:TaskTime]->(:IfcTaskTime)}
WITH date(event.EventOccurenceTime) AS issueDate
WITH toString(issueDate.dayOfWeek) AS DayOfWeek, COUNT(*) AS Count
RETURN DayOfWeek, Count
ORDER BY Count DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: Show me all the system groupings defined in the classification structure.
reference_answer:
MATCH (sysGroup:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Systems"})
      -[:HasReferences]->(category:IfcClassificationReference)
RETURN category.Name

question_text: Which rooms have shown increasing WO activity in the last year?
reference_answer:
MATCH (space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

WITH space.Name AS RoomName, date(tt.ScheduleStart).year AS year, count(*) AS numTasks
WITH RoomName, year, numTasks
ORDER BY RoomName, year DESC

WITH RoomName,
     collect({year: year, count: numTasks}) AS yearCounts
WHERE size(yearCounts) >= 2 AND yearCounts[0].count > yearCounts[1].count

RETURN RoomName, yearCounts[1].year AS PreviousYear, yearCounts[0].year AS RecentYear,
       yearCounts[1].count AS PreviousCount, yearCounts[0].count AS RecentCount
ORDER BY RecentCount DESC

question_text: How many spaces does the eleventh floor of building <BUILDING_ID> have?
reference_answer:
MATCH (building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey {Name: <STOREY_ID>})
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)

RETURN count(space) AS NumberOfSpacesOnB01

question_text: How many storeys are there?

question_text: What classification group includes hvac and ac?

MATCH (group:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:HasReferences]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
WHERE toLower(leaf.Name) = "hvac and ac"
RETURN DISTINCT group.Name AS ClassificationGroup

question_text: What information are directly stored in a building node?

MATCH (b:IfcBuilding)
RETURN keys(b) AS Attributes
LIMIT 1

question_text: In which quarter of 2022 were the most tasks scheduled?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart >= datetime("2022-01-01") AND tt.ScheduleStart < datetime("2023-01-01")
WITH tt.ScheduleStart AS schedDate
WITH 
  CASE 
    WHEN schedDate.month IN [1,2,3] THEN "Q1"
    WHEN schedDate.month IN [4,5,6] THEN "Q2"
    WHEN schedDate.month IN [7,8,9] THEN "Q3"
    ELSE "Q4"
  END AS quarter,
  count(*) AS taskCount
RETURN quarter, taskCount
ORDER BY taskCount DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: When was the cost for <COST_ITEM_ID> billed in WO <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem {Identification: "<COST_ITEM_ID>"})

MATCH (ci)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

RETURN date(prop.NominalValue) AS BillingDate

question_text: How many billing records include a non-zero shift premium?

question_text: What key attributes are stored in an IfcEvent?

question_text: What is the total difference between the charged and paid amounts?
reference_answer:

      -[:HasCostValue]->(charged:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalCharged"}),
      (costItem)-[:HasCostValue]->(paid:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})
RETURN SUM(charged.AppliedValue) - SUM(paid.AppliedValue) AS TotalDifference

question_text: Give me the min shift premium for wo <WORK_ORDER_ID>.
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "ShiftPremium"})

RETURN MIN(cv.AppliedValue) AS MinShiftPremium

question_text: Do any tasks span over 90 days but involve less than 2 billed hours?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.EarlyStart IS NOT NULL AND tt.EarlyFinish IS NOT NULL

WITH task, duration.inDays(date(tt.EarlyStart), date(tt.EarlyFinish)).days AS TaskDuration

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

WITH task, TaskDuration, SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalHours
WHERE TaskDuration > 90 AND TotalHours < 2

RETURN task.Identification AS TaskID, TaskDuration, TotalHours

question_text: Which planner’s tasks classified as alarms were billed most promptly in 2022?
reference_answer:
MATCH (category:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Alarms"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart.year = 2022


MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(assignToSchedule:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(assignToCost:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
      (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

MATCH (task)-[:IsRelatedBy]->(rel:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(actor:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(pno:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(planner:IfcPerson)

WITH planner.GivenName + " " + planner.FamilyName AS Planner,
     duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
RETURN Planner, round(avg(delay.days), 1) AS AvgBillingDelay
ORDER BY AvgBillingDelay ASC

question_text: Give me the cost items that have values (e.g. ShiftPremium, TotalPaid) but are not part of any schedule?
reference_answer:
MATCH (costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue)
WHERE cv.Name IN ["ShiftPremium", "TotalPaid"]

AND NOT EXISTS {
  MATCH (schedule:IfcCostSchedule)
        -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
        -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem)
}

RETURN costItem.Identification AS UnlinkedCostItem, COLLECT(DISTINCT cv.Name) AS ValueTypes

      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(:IfcClassificationReference)

      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(time:IfcTaskTime)

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

WITH date(time.ScheduleStart).year AS Year, count(task) AS Count
RETURN Year, Count

question_text: For each task assigned to Plumbers in building <BUILDING_ID>, list the space and scheduled time.

MATCH (category:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Plumbers"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(:IfcClassificationReference)

question_text: What was the total time billed with shift premiums under WO <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(premium:IfcCostValue {Name: "ShiftPremium"}),
            (costItem)-[:HasCostValue]->(hours:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})
WHERE premium.AppliedValue > 0

RETURN SUM(hours.AppliedValue) AS HoursWithPremium

question_text: Are more hours billed for lighting systems or HVAC systems?
reference_answer:
MATCH (lighting:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Lighting Systems"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task1:IfcTask)
MATCH (task1)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(:IfcSpace)
MATCH (task1)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci1:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv1:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

WITH SUM(cv1.AppliedValue) AS lightingHours

MATCH (hvac:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "HVAC and AC"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf2:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task2:IfcTask)
MATCH (task2)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(:IfcSpace)
MATCH (task2)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci2:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv2:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

WITH lightingHours, SUM(cv2.AppliedValue) AS hvacHours
RETURN lightingHours, hvacHours,
       CASE 
         WHEN lightingHours > hvacHours THEN "Lighting systems have more billed hours"
         WHEN hvacHours > lightingHours THEN "HVAC systems have more billed hours"
         ELSE "Both categories have equal billed hours"
       END AS Result

question_text: Identify personnel whose assigned work orders were always processed for billing in under a week.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
  -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
  -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
  -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
  -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
  -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
  -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
        (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

MATCH (task)-[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
  -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
  -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
  -[:ThePerson]->(planner:IfcPerson)

WITH planner.Identification AS PlannerID,
     duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
WITH PlannerID, collect(delay.days) AS Delays
WITH PlannerID, Delays
WHERE all(d IN Delays WHERE d <= 7)

WITH collect({PlannerID: PlannerID, Count: size(Delays)}) AS Results
RETURN size(Results) > 0 AS Exists, Results

      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)

MATCH (task)

question_text: Count the number of USERDEFINED WOs that issued per month in 2022.
reference_answer:
MATCH (event:IfcEvent)
WHERE event.PredefinedType = "USERDEFINED"
  AND event.EventOccurenceTime >= datetime("2022-01-01")
  AND event.EventOccurenceTime < datetime("2023-01-01")

WITH apoc.date.format(datetime(event.EventOccurenceTime).epochMillis, "ms", "yyyy-MM") AS Month
RETURN Month, count(*) AS NumEvents
ORDER BY Month

      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (costItem)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)

      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)

question_text: For each organization, what’s the average time between task execution and billing?
reference_answer:
MATCH (org:IfcOrganization)
MATCH (org)-[:Engages]->(pno:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
MATCH (pno)-[:IsActingUpon]->(actor:IfcActor)
MATCH (actor)-[:IsActingUpon]->(relActor:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
MATCH (relActor)-[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(assignToSchedule:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
MATCH (assignToSchedule)-[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)
MATCH (schedule)-[:Controls]->(assignToCost:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
MATCH (assignToCost)-[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(relDef:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
MATCH (relDef)-[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
MATCH (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"})
MATCH (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH org.Name AS Organization, duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
RETURN Organization, round(avg(delay.days), 1) AS AvgDelay
ORDER BY AvgDelay DESC

question_text: What premium adjustments were recorded for task <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)
MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "ShiftPremium"})
RETURN DISTINCT cv.AppliedValue AS ShiftPremium
ORDER BY ShiftPremium

question_text: Calculate the mean time difference (in days) between the execution date and the billing date for all records.
reference_answer:
MATCH (costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH date(wd.NominalValue) AS workDate, date(bd.NominalValue) AS billingDate
WITH duration.inDays(workDate, billingDate) AS delay
RETURN avg(delay.days) AS AvgDelayInDays

question_text: Are there any spaces that had both lighting and plumbing work in the same month?
reference_answer:
MATCH (lightClass:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Lighting Issues"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(lightTask:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(lightTime:IfcTaskTime),
      
      (lightTask)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)

MATCH (plumbClass:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Plumbers"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(plumbTask:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(plumbTime:IfcTaskTime),
      
      (plumbTask)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space)

WHERE date(lightTime.ScheduleStart).year = date(plumbTime.ScheduleStart).year
  AND date(lightTime.ScheduleStart).month = date(plumbTime.ScheduleStart).month

RETURN DISTINCT space.Name AS SpaceWithBoth

question_text: What is the average duration of <PRIORITY_LABEL>-priority tasks in building <BUILDING_ID>?

MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(time:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE time.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND time.ScheduleFinish IS NOT NULL

MATCH (task)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(p:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "Priority"})
WHERE p.NominalValue = "<PRIORITY_LABEL>"

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

WITH duration.between(date(time.ScheduleStart), date(time.ScheduleFinish)) AS d
RETURN avg(d.days) AS AvgDurationInDays

question_text: What percentage of 2023 tasks were assigned to Steamfitters?
reference_answer:
MATCH (c:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Steamfitters"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart >= datetime("2023-01-01") AND tt.ScheduleStart < datetime("2024-01-01")

WITH COUNT(DISTINCT task) AS steamfitterTasks

MATCH (taskAll:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(ttAll:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE ttAll.ScheduleStart >= datetime("2023-01-01") AND ttAll.ScheduleStart < datetime("2024-01-01")

WITH steamfitterTasks, COUNT(DISTINCT taskAll) AS totalTasks
RETURN toFloat(steamfitterTasks) / totalTasks * 100 AS SteamfitterTaskPercentage

question_text: What is the total duration in days from the first recorded to the last recorded billing date for work order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (ci)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH date(prop.NominalValue) AS bd
RETURN duration.between(min(bd), max(bd)).days AS BillingDateRangeInDays

question_text: What is the typical billing turnaround time per building?
