MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding)

WITH building.Name AS BuildingName, duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
RETURN BuildingName, round(avg(delay.days), 1) AS AvgBillingTurnaroundDays
ORDER BY AvgBillingTurnaroundDays DESC

question_text: Where is power and shutdown requests categorized (main category) in the system?
reference_answer:
MATCH (child:IfcClassificationReference)-[:ReferencedSource]->(parent:IfcClassificationReference)-[:ReferencedSource]->(toplevelcategory:IfcClassificationReference)
WHERE toLower(child.Name) = "power and shutdown requests"
RETURN toplevelcategory.Name

question_text: Which storey has the largest number of rooms?
reference_answer:
MATCH (storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)

RETURN storey.Name AS StoreyName, count(space) AS RoomCount
ORDER BY RoomCount DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: List any spaces that received more than 5 tasks in a single day.
reference_answer:
MATCH (space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

WITH space.Name AS SpaceName, date(tt.ScheduleStart) AS TaskDate, count(*) AS NumTasks
WHERE NumTasks > 5

RETURN SpaceName, TaskDate, NumTasks
ORDER BY NumTasks DESC

question_text: Among all billed WOs in third floors, how many fall under safety and hazards?
reference_answer:
MATCH (cat:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Safety and Hazards"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey {Name: <STOREY_ID>})

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem)

RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT task) AS SafetyTasksWithBilling

question_text: Which node represents a billing record?
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcCostItem" AS Entity

question_text: Report the top 10 action categories that demonstrate the fastest average turnaround time between the recorded Work Date and Billing Date.
reference_answer:
MATCH (root:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Actions And Issues"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(category:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH category.Name AS Category, duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
RETURN Category, round(avg(delay.days), 1) AS AvgBillingDelay
ORDER BY AvgBillingDelay ASC
LIMIT 10

question_text: Which classification types have an average task duration greater than 5 days on first floors and occur more than three times?
reference_answer:
MATCH (cls:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.EarlyStart IS NOT NULL AND tt.EarlyFinish IS NOT NULL

MATCH (task)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey {Name: <STOREY_ID>})

WITH leaf.Name AS Classification, duration.inDays(date(tt.EarlyStart), date(tt.EarlyFinish)).days AS Duration

WITH Classification, avg(Duration) AS AvgDuration, count(*) AS NumTasks
WHERE AvgDuration > 5 AND NumTasks > 2

RETURN Classification, round(AvgDuration, 1) AS AverageDuration, NumTasks
ORDER BY AvgDuration DESC
LIMIT 10

question_text: How is work order classification data organized in this system?
reference_answer:
MATCH (c:IfcClassification)-[:HasReferences]->(ref:IfcClassificationReference)
RETURN ref.Name

question_text: Which tasks were issued through HelpdeskSubmission in 2022?
reference_answer:
MATCH (event:IfcEvent)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
WHERE event.UserDefinedEventTriggerType = "HelpdeskSubmission"
  AND event.EventOccurenceTime >= datetime("2022-01-01")
  AND event.EventOccurenceTime < datetime("2023-01-01")
RETURN task.Identification AS TaskID, event.EventOccurenceTime AS IssuedAt

question_text: Show me all space comfort issue work orders inside building <BUILDING_ID>.
reference_answer:
MATCH (category:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Space Comfort Issues"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task)

RETURN DISTINCT task.Identification AS WorkOrderID

question_text: What is the path from the IfcTask to IfcCostSchedule?
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcTask -[:HasAssignments]-> IfcRelAssignsToControl -[:RelatingControl]-> IfcCostSchedule" AS Path

question_text: Which path connects a work order to its billings?
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcTask -[:HasAssignments]-> IfcRelAssignsToControl -[:RelatingControl]-> IfcCostSchedule -[:Controls]-> IfcRelAssignsToControl -[:RelatedObjects]-> IfcCostItem" AS Path

question_text: Can you list all the issue-related labels at the lowest level of the actions and issues classification?
reference_answer:
MATCH (root:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Actions And Issues"})
      -[:HasReferences]->(mid:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:HasReferences]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
RETURN DISTINCT leaf.Name

question_text: What WOa are associated with the actions and issues classification?
reference_answer:
MATCH (classification:IfcClassificationReference)
WHERE toLower(classification.Name) = "actions and issues"
MATCH (classification)-[:HasReferences*0..]->(ref:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(wo:IfcTask)
RETURN DISTINCT wo.Identification

question_text: What is the IFC entity that represents a work order?
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcTask" AS Entity

question_text: Which classification group had the fastest average turnaround between labor and billing?
reference_answer:
MATCH (root:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Actions And Issues"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(category:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH category.Name AS Category, duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
RETURN Category, round(avg(delay.days), 1) AS AvgBillingDelay
ORDER BY AvgBillingDelay ASC
LIMIT 10

question_text: What is the average wage rate applied in service order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(assignToSchedule:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(assignItems:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "PayRate"})

RETURN AVG(cv.AppliedValue) AS AvgPayRate

question_text: what is the range of the chargeout rate for service order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "ChargeoutRate"})

RETURN MAX(cv.AppliedValue) - MIN(cv.AppliedValue) AS ChargeoutRateRange

question_text: List all storeys with more than 10 work orders.
reference_answer:
MATCH (storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)

WITH storey.Name AS StoreyName, count(task) AS TaskCount
WHERE TaskCount > 10
RETURN StoreyName, TaskCount
ORDER BY TaskCount DESC

question_text: Which buildings had the fastest response time between WO creation and execution?
reference_answer:
MATCH (event:IfcEvent)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND event.EventOccurenceTime IS NOT NULL

WITH task, duration.between(date(event.EventOccurenceTime), date(tt.ScheduleStart)).days AS delay

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding)

RETURN building.Name AS Building, avg(delay) AS AvgResponseDays
ORDER BY AvgResponseDays ASC
LIMIT 5

question_text: What was the peak chargeout rate used in billing for WO <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "ChargeoutRate"})

RETURN MAX(cv.AppliedValue) AS MaxChargeoutRate

question_text: What is the min number of billed hours?
reference_answer:
MATCH (value:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})
RETURN MIN(value.AppliedValue) AS MinHours

question_text: Metal sheets and covers belong to which main category in classification?
reference_answer:
MATCH (group:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:HasReferences]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
WHERE toLower(leaf.Name) = "metal sheets and covers"
RETURN DISTINCT group.Name AS ClassificationGroup

question_text: Give me the building of the room <SPACE_ID>.
reference_answer:
MATCH (building:IfcBuilding)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace {Name: "<SPACE_ID>"})

RETURN building.Name AS BuildingName

question_text: What is the range of chargeout rates in the dataset?
reference_answer:
MATCH (value:IfcCostValue {Name: "ChargeoutRate"})
RETURN MAX(value.AppliedValue) - MIN(value.AppliedValue) AS ChargeoutRateRange

question_text: How is an IfcTask connected to its related space?
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcTask -[:OperatesOn]-> IfcRelAssignsToProcess -[:RelatedObjects]-> IfcSpace" AS Path

question_text: Show me any storey we have in the system.
reference_answer:
MATCH (s:IfcBuildingStorey)
RETURN s.Name AS StoreyNam
ORDER BY s.Name

question_text: What is the average number of work orders per storey?
reference_answer:
MATCH (storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)

WITH storey.Name AS StoreyName, count(task) AS TaskCount
RETURN avg(TaskCount) AS AverageTasksPerStorey

question_text: What is the total of all paid amounts?
reference_answer:
MATCH (value:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})
RETURN SUM(value.AppliedValue) AS SumTotalPaid

question_text: Identify tasks with the Maintenance Activity Code <PMActivity> that were assigned to the planner <GIVEN_NAME> <FAMILY_NAME>.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(pm:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "PMActivity"})
WHERE pm.NominalValue = "<PMActivity>"

MATCH (task)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(person:IfcPerson)
WHERE person.GivenName = "<GIVEN_NAME>" AND person.FamilyName = "<FAMILY_NAME>"

RETURN DISTINCT task.Identification AS WorkOrderID

question_text: Under what systems is the WO <WORK_ORDER_ID> categorized?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})-[:HasAssociations]->(assoc:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)-[:RelatingClassification]->(ref:IfcClassificationReference)-[:ReferencedSource]->(systems:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Systems"})
RETURN DISTINCT ref.Name

question_text: Give me the tasks involving hvac and ac for all rooms on floor <STOREY_ID>.
reference_answer:
MATCH (category:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "HVAC and AC"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (storey:IfcBuildingStorey {Name: "<STOREY_ID>"})
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task)

RETURN DISTINCT task.Identification AS WorkOrderID

question_text: Are there any safety and hazard service orders happening in first floor of building <BUILDING_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (category:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Safety and Hazards"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey {Name: <STOREY_ID>})
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task)

RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT task) > 0 AS HasSafetyHazardTasks

question_text: How many labor hours have been logged by <GIVEN_NAME> <FAMILY_NAME> for tasks located in building <BUILDING_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(person:IfcPerson)
WHERE person.GivenName = "<GIVEN_NAME>" AND person.FamilyName = "<FAMILY_NAME>"

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

RETURN SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalHours

question_text: What factors determine how much a worker is paid?
reference_answer:
MATCH (:IfcCostItem)-[:HasCostValue]->(totalpaid:IfcCostValue {Name:"TotalPaid"})-[:HasComponents]->(laborCost:IfcCostValue {Name: "LaborCost"})
MATCH (laborCost)-[:HasComponents]->(operand:IfcCostValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (operand)-[:HasComponents]->(leaf:IfcCostValue)
RETURN DISTINCT
  laborCost.Name AS RootName,
  laborCost.ArithmeticOperator AS RootOperator,
  operand.Name AS OperandName,
  operand.ArithmeticOperator AS OperandOperator,
  leaf.Name AS LeafOperandName

question_text: What’s the range of chargeout rates for work orders from distribution channel <DistributionChannel>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(channel:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "DistributionChannel"})
WHERE toFloat(channel.NominalValue) = <DistributionChannel>

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "ChargeoutRate"})

RETURN 
  min(cv.AppliedValue) AS MinChargeoutRate,
  max(cv.AppliedValue) AS MaxChargeoutRate

question_text: What is the total paid amount for tasks with system status <SystemStatus>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(status:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "SystemStatus"})
WHERE status.NominalValue CONTAINS "<SystemStatus>"

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})

RETURN SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalPaidForTECO_Status

question_text: What is the trigger type of the event that issued WO <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(event:IfcEvent)
RETURN event.EventTriggerType AS TriggerType

question_text: What is the scheduled start date of work order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
RETURN tt.ScheduleStart

question_text: Identify all rooms that are associated with a cost item recording more than 10 hours of labor.
reference_answer:
MATCH (space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})
WHERE cv.AppliedValue > 10

RETURN DISTINCT space.Name AS RoomName, item.Identification AS CostItem, cv.AppliedValue AS Hours

question_text: What’s the mean hourly pay rate for workers on WO <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(assignToSchedule:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(assignItems:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "PayRate"})

RETURN AVG(cv.AppliedValue) AS AvgPayRate

question_text: What is the average billing delay for tasks that have a distribution channel?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(dist:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE dist.Name = "DistributionChannel"

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(ps:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE wd.Name = "WorkDate"

MATCH (ps)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE bd.Name = "BillingDate"

WITH task, duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay, dist.NominalValue AS distCode
RETURN 
  CASE WHEN distCode IS NULL THEN "No Distribution Channel" ELSE "Has Distribution Channel" END AS DistributionStatus,
  avg(delay.days) AS AvgDelayDays

question_text: Plumbers belong to which classification group?
reference_answer:
MATCH (group:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:HasReferences]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
WHERE toLower(leaf.Name) = "plumbers"
RETURN DISTINCT group.Name AS ClassificationGroup

question_text: List all rooms that had priority <PRIORITY_LABEL> tasks in 2022.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(time:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE date(time.ScheduleStart).year = 2022

MATCH (task)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(p:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "Priority"})
WHERE p.NominalValue = "<PRIORITY_LABEL>"

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)

RETURN DISTINCT space.Name AS RoomName

question_text: What are the main data fields stored in a billing record?
reference_answer:
MATCH (:IfcCostItem)-[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue)
RETURN DISTINCT cv.Name AS Field
UNION
MATCH (:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(psv:IfcPropertySingleValue)
RETURN DISTINCT psv.Name AS Field

question_text: What is the earliest recorded work date among all cost entries for WO <WORK_ORDER_ID> ?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (ci)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"})

RETURN min(date(prop.NominalValue)) AS EarliestWorkDate

question_text: Return the WOs for which billing happened before the work date.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WHERE date(bd.NominalValue) < date(wd.NominalValue)

RETURN task.Identification AS TaskID, date(wd.NominalValue) AS WorkDate, date(bd.NominalValue) AS BillingDate

question_text: Which rooms had WOs assigned by planner <PERSON_ID> with chargeout over $50?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(person:IfcPerson {Identification: "<PERSON_ID>"})

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "ChargeoutRate"})
WHERE cv.AppliedValue > 50

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)

RETURN DISTINCT space.Name AS RoomName

question_text: Find all planners who managed tasks in <BUILDING_ID> that were BOTH 'High Value' (TotalPaid > $1000) AND 'Late Billed' (Billing delay > 20 days). Return the Planner's name and the count of such tasks.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(planner:IfcPerson)

MATCH (task)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(b:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})

MATCH (costItem)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
MATCH (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"})
MATCH (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH planner, cv.AppliedValue AS Cost, 
     duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)).days AS Delay
WHERE Cost > 1000 AND Delay > 20

RETURN planner.GivenName + " " + planner.FamilyName AS PlannerName, count(*) AS ProblematicTaskCount

question_text: What goes into calculating the total amount paid for a worker?
reference_answer:
MATCH (:IfcCostItem)-[:HasCostValue]->(totalpaid:IfcCostValue {Name:"TotalPaid"})-[:HasComponents]->(laborCost:IfcCostValue {Name: "LaborCost"})
MATCH (laborCost)-[:HasComponents]->(operand:IfcCostValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (operand)-[:HasComponents]->(leaf:IfcCostValue)
RETURN DISTINCT
  laborCost.Name AS RootName,
  laborCost.ArithmeticOperator AS RootOperator,
  operand.Name AS OperandName,
  operand.ArithmeticOperator AS OperandOperator,
  leaf.Name AS LeafOperandName

      -[:Controls]->(assignItems:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

RETURN SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalHours

question_text: What is the average billing turnaround time per year since 2021?
reference_answer:
MATCH (ci:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE wd.Name = "WorkDate"

MATCH (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE bd.Name = "BillingDate"

WITH date(wd.NominalValue) AS workDate, date(bd.NominalValue) AS billingDate
WITH workDate, billingDate,
     duration.inDays(workDate, billingDate).days AS delayDays
WHERE workDate IS NOT NULL AND billingDate IS NOT NULL

WITH workDate.year AS year, avg(delayDays) AS avgDelay
RETURN year, avgDelay
ORDER BY year

      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)

      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalCharged"})

WITH status.NominalValue AS SystemStatus, SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalCharged

RETURN SystemStatus, COUNT(*) AS WorkOrderCount
ORDER BY WorkOrderCount DESC

question_text: Which classification type had the highest total increase in usage across 2023?
reference_answer:
MATCH (root:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Actions And Issues"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart >= datetime("2023-01-01") AND tt.ScheduleStart < datetime("2024-01-01")

WITH leaf.Name AS classification, tt.ScheduleStart AS sched
WITH classification,
     apoc.date.format(datetime(sched).epochMillis, "ms", "yyyy-MM") AS month,
     count(*) AS taskCount
WITH classification, collect({month: month, count: taskCount}) AS monthCounts
WITH classification,
     [i IN range(1, size(monthCounts)-1) | 
       monthCounts[i].count - monthCounts[i-1].count] AS monthlyGrowths
WITH classification, reduce(total = 0, diff IN monthlyGrowths | total + diff) AS growthSum
RETURN classification, growthSum
ORDER BY growthSum DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: List planners associated with tasks billed more than 25 days after execution.

MATCH (person)-[:EngagedIn]->(pno:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
MATCH (pno)-[:IsActingUpon]->(actor:IfcActor)
MATCH (actor)-[:IsActingUpon]->(relActor:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
MATCH (relActor)-[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(assignToSchedule:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
MATCH (assignToSchedule)-[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)
MATCH (schedule)-[:Controls]->(assignToCost:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
MATCH (assignToCost)-[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(relDef:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
MATCH (relDef)-[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
MATCH (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"})
MATCH (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH person, duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
WHERE delay.days > 25
RETURN DISTINCT person.GivenName + " " + person.FamilyName AS Planner

question_text: When a task is labeled as emergency, does it tend to be associated with higher pay rates?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(priority:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE priority.Name = "Priority"

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(pay:IfcCostValue {Name: "PayRate"})

RETURN
  avg(CASE WHEN toUpper(priority.NominalValue) = "<PRIORITY_LABEL>" THEN pay.AppliedValue ELSE null END) AS EmergencyAvgPayRate,
  avg(CASE WHEN toUpper(priority.NominalValue) <> "<PRIORITY_LABEL>" THEN pay.AppliedValue ELSE null END) AS NonEmergencyAvgPayRate

question_text: Is the average duration of emergency tasks longer than routine ones?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task1:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(p1:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE p1.Name = "Priority" AND p1.NominalValue = "<PRIORITY_LABEL>"
MATCH (task1)-[:TaskTime]->(tt1:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt1.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND tt1.ScheduleFinish IS NOT NULL
WITH avg(duration.inDays(date(tt1.ScheduleStart), date(tt1.ScheduleFinish)).days) AS emergencyAvg

MATCH (task2:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(p2:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE p2.Name = "Priority" AND p2.NominalValue = "<PRIORITY_LABEL>"
MATCH (task2)-[:TaskTime]->(tt2:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt2.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND tt2.ScheduleFinish IS NOT NULL
WITH emergencyAvg, avg(duration.inDays(date(tt2.ScheduleStart), date(tt2.ScheduleFinish)).days) AS routineAvg
RETURN emergencyAvg > routineAvg AS EmergencyLonger

question_text: What classification types typically follow (in less than or equal to 30 days) inspection and coordination in the same room?
reference_answer:
MATCH (c1:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Inspection and Coordination"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf1:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(t1:IfcTask)
MATCH (t1)-[:TaskTime]->(tt1:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt1.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t1)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)

MATCH (space)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(t2:IfcTask)
MATCH (t2)-[:TaskTime]->(tt2:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt2.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL
  AND tt2.ScheduleStart > tt1.ScheduleStart
  AND duration.inDays(date(tt1.ScheduleStart), date(tt2.ScheduleStart)).days <= 30

MATCH (t2)-[:HasAssociations]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatingClassification]->(c2:IfcClassificationReference)
WHERE toLower(c2.Name) <> "Inspection and Coordination"

RETURN DISTINCT c2.Name AS FollowUpClassification,
                COUNT(*) AS Occurrences
ORDER BY Occurrences DESC
LIMIT 10

question_text: Is the billing date always later than the task’s scheduled finish?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleFinish IS NOT NULL

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE bd.Name = "BillingDate" AND bd.NominalValue IS NOT NULL

WITH date(bd.NominalValue) AS billDate, date(tt.ScheduleFinish) AS schedFinish
RETURN ALL(x IN collect(billDate > schedFinish) WHERE x) AS AlwaysLater

question_text: Do USERDEFINED-triggered work orders tend to have longer completion delays than other work orders?
reference_answer:
MATCH (event:IfcEvent {EventTriggerType: "USERDEFINED"})
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(assign:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleFinish IS NOT NULL AND event.EventOccurenceTime IS NOT NULL
WITH duration.inDays(date(event.EventOccurenceTime), date(tt.ScheduleFinish)) AS delay1

MATCH (event2:IfcEvent)
WHERE event2.EventTriggerType <> "USERDEFINED"

MATCH (event2)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(assign2:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task2:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(tt2:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt2.ScheduleFinish IS NOT NULL AND event2.EventOccurenceTime IS NOT NULL
WITH avg(delay1) AS userDefAvg,
     avg(duration.inDays(date(event2.EventOccurenceTime), date(tt2.ScheduleFinish))) AS otherAvg

RETURN userDefAvg > otherAvg AS IsUserDefinedMoreLate

question_text: On average, how much time passes between consecutive task starts for each planner?
reference_answer:
MATCH (planner:IfcPerson)
      -[:EngagedIn]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:IsActingUpon]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:IsActingUpon]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

WITH planner, task, tt.ScheduleStart AS sched
ORDER BY planner.Identification, sched

WITH planner.Identification AS PlannerID,
     collect(sched) AS startDates

WITH PlannerID,
     [i IN range(1, size(startDates)-1) |
      duration.between(startDates[i-1], startDates[i]).days] AS delays

UNWIND delays AS gapDays
RETURN PlannerID, avg(gapDays) AS AvgGapBetweenTasks
ORDER BY AvgGapBetweenTasks DESC

question_text: Are there any floors where two tasks of the same category were issued back-to-back (within 1 day)?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task1:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(tt1:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt1.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

MATCH (task2:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(tt2:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt2.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND task1 <> task2


MATCH (task1)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)-[:RelatedObjects]->(space1:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)-[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)

MATCH (task2)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)-[:RelatedObjects]->(space2:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)-[:RelatingObject]->(storey)


MATCH (task1)-[:HasAssociations]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)-[:RelatingClassification]->(class1:IfcClassificationReference)
MATCH (task2)-[:HasAssociations]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)-[:RelatingClassification]->(class2:IfcClassificationReference)

WHERE class1.Name = class2.Name


AND abs(duration.inDays(date(tt1.ScheduleStart), date(tt2.ScheduleStart)).days) <= 1

RETURN DISTINCT storey.Name AS Storey,
       class1.Name AS Classification,
       task1.Identification AS TaskA,
       task2.Identification AS TaskB,
       tt1.ScheduleStart AS StartA,
       tt2.ScheduleStart AS StartB
ORDER BY Storey, StartA

question_text: What is the average delay between work date and billing date across all cost entries?
reference_answer:
MATCH (costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH date(wd.NominalValue) AS workDate, date(bd.NominalValue) AS billingDate
WITH duration.inDays(workDate, billingDate) AS delay
RETURN avg(delay.days) AS AvgDelayInDays

question_text: Which month saw the highest increase in plumbing-related tasks compared to the previous month?
reference_answer:
MATCH (cat:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Plumbers"})
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
MATCH (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

WITH tt.ScheduleStart AS date
WITH apoc.date.format(timestamp(date), "ms", "yyyy-MM") AS month, count(*) AS numTasks

WITH month, numTasks
ORDER BY month
WITH collect({month: month, count: numTasks}) AS monthCounts

WITH [i IN range(1, size(monthCounts)-1) | 
  {
    currentMonth: monthCounts[i].month, 
    increase: monthCounts[i].count - monthCounts[i-1].count
  }
] AS diffs

UNWIND diffs AS row
WITH row
WHERE row.increase > 0
RETURN row.currentMonth AS Month, row.increase AS Increase
ORDER BY row.increase DESC
LIMIT 1

WHERE event.EventOccurenceTime IS NOT NULL AND tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

WITH duration.inDays(date(event.EventOccurenceTime), date(tt.ScheduleStart)).days AS delayDays
RETURN max(delayDays) AS MaxSchedulingDelay

WITH task, collect(DISTINCT prop.NominalValue) AS priorities
WHERE "<PRIORITY_LABEL>" IN priorities AND "<PRIORITY_LABEL>" IN priorities

RETURN task.Identification AS TaskID,
       priorities

reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(time:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE date(time.ScheduleStart) >= date("2022-01-01")
  AND date(time.ScheduleStart) < date("2023-01-01")

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding)

RETURN DISTINCT building.Name AS BuildingName

question_text: What is the average delay between WO creation and billing date?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(event:IfcEvent),
      (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(billing:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE billing.Name = "BillingDate"

WITH date(event.EventOccurenceTime) AS creation, date(billing.NominalValue) AS bill
WITH duration.inDays(creation, bill) AS diff
RETURN avg(diff.days) AS AvgCreationToBillingDays

question_text: What is the average billing delay for tasks created by <GIVEN_NAME> <FAMILY_NAME>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (person:IfcPerson {GivenName: "<GIVEN_NAME>", FamilyName: "<FAMILY_NAME>"})
MATCH (person)-[:EngagedIn]->(pno:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
MATCH (pno)-[:IsActingUpon]->(actor:IfcActor)
MATCH (actor)-[:IsActingUpon]->(relActor:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
MATCH (relActor)-[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(assignSchedule:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
MATCH (assignSchedule)-[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)
MATCH (schedule)-[:Controls]->(assignCost:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
MATCH (assignCost)-[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(relDef:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
MATCH (relDef)-[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
MATCH (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"})
MATCH (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
RETURN round(avg(delay.days), 1) AS AvgBillingDelayBy<GIVEN_NAME>

question_text: What is the full name of IfcPerson <PERSON_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (p:IfcPerson {Identification: "<PERSON_ID>"})
RETURN p.GivenName + ' ' + p.FamilyName AS FullName

question_text: Do supply and installation tasks tend to be billed faster (on avg) than inspection and coordination ones?
reference_answer:
UNWIND ["Supply and Installation", "Inspection and Coordination"] AS categoryName

MATCH (classification:IfcClassificationReference {Name: categoryName})
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH categoryName AS Category, duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
RETURN Category, round(avg(delay.days), 1) AS AvgBillingDelay
ORDER BY Category

question_text: Which work order had the longest scheduled duration?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(time:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE time.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND time.ScheduleFinish IS NOT NULL

WITH task, duration.between(date(time.ScheduleStart), date(time.ScheduleFinish)).days AS durationDays
RETURN task.Identification AS WorkOrderID, durationDays AS LongestScheduledDuration
ORDER BY durationDays DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: For the shift premiums for wo <WORK_ORDER_ID>, calculate their average.
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "ShiftPremium"})

RETURN AVG(cv.AppliedValue) AS AvgShiftPremium

question_text: Did any floor have multiple tasks of the same classification issued in immediate succession (<= 1 day)?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task1:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(tt1:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt1.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

MATCH (task2:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(tt2:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt2.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND task1 <> task2


MATCH (task1)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)-[:RelatedObjects]->(space1:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)-[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)

MATCH (task2)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)-[:RelatedObjects]->(space2:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)-[:RelatingObject]->(storey)


MATCH (task1)-[:HasAssociations]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)-[:RelatingClassification]->(class1:IfcClassificationReference)
MATCH (task2)-[:HasAssociations]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)-[:RelatingClassification]->(class2:IfcClassificationReference)

WHERE class1.Name = class2.Name


AND abs(duration.inDays(date(tt1.ScheduleStart), date(tt2.ScheduleStart)).days) <= 1

RETURN DISTINCT storey.Name AS Storey,
       class1.Name AS Classification,
       task1.Identification AS TaskA,
       task2.Identification AS TaskB,
       tt1.ScheduleStart AS StartA,
       tt2.ScheduleStart AS StartB
ORDER BY Storey, StartA

question_text: Give me the recorded work date for item <COST_ITEM_ID> in task <WORK_ORDER_ID>.
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem {Identification: "<COST_ITEM_ID>"})

MATCH (ci)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"})

RETURN date(prop.NominalValue) AS WorkDate

question_text: What combination of fields results in the paid amount shown on a billing entry?
reference_answer:
MATCH (:IfcCostItem)-[:HasCostValue]->(totalpaid:IfcCostValue {Name:"TotalPaid"})-[:HasComponents]->(laborCost:IfcCostValue {Name: "LaborCost"})
MATCH (laborCost)-[:HasComponents]->(operand:IfcCostValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (operand)-[:HasComponents]->(leaf:IfcCostValue)
RETURN DISTINCT
  laborCost.Name AS RootName,
  laborCost.ArithmeticOperator AS RootOperator,
  operand.Name AS OperandName,
  operand.ArithmeticOperator AS OperandOperator,
  leaf.Name AS LeafOperandName

question_text: Which building pairs show similar task profiles based on shared classifications and average cost differences?
reference_answer:
MATCH (building:IfcBuilding)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssociations]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatingClassification]->(cls:IfcClassificationReference)

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})

WITH 
  building.Name AS Building,
  cls.Name AS Classification,
  ROUND(AVG(cv.AppliedValue), 1) AS AvgPaid

WITH collect([Building, Classification, AvgPaid]) AS data
UNWIND data AS b1
UNWIND data AS b2

WITH 
  b1[0] AS BuildingA,
  b1[1] AS ClassificationA,
  b1[2] AS CostA,
  b2[0] AS BuildingB,
  b2[1] AS ClassificationB,
  b2[2] AS CostB
WHERE BuildingA < BuildingB AND ClassificationA = ClassificationB

WITH 
  BuildingA, 
  BuildingB, 
  COUNT(*) AS SharedClassifications,
  AVG(ABS(CostA - CostB)) AS AvgCostDifference

WHERE SharedClassifications >= 3 AND AvgCostDifference <= 100

RETURN 
  BuildingA, 
  BuildingB, 
  SharedClassifications,
  ROUND(AvgCostDifference, 1) AS AvgCostDifference
ORDER BY SharedClassifications DESC, AvgCostDifference ASC
LIMIT 10

question_text: Show me WOs involving computers and equipment classification.
reference_answer:
MATCH (classification:IfcClassificationReference)
WHERE toLower(classification.Name) = "computers and equipment"
MATCH (classification)-[:HasReferences*0..]->(ref:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(wo:IfcTask)
RETURN DISTINCT wo.Identification

question_text: Is there any classification only used once?
reference_answer:
MATCH (root:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Actions And Issues"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

WITH leaf.Name AS Classification, count(DISTINCT task) AS TaskCount
WHERE TaskCount = 1
RETURN Classification, TaskCount
LIMIT 10

question_text: Identify the classification categories for tasks managed by <PERSON_ID> that occurred specifically within room <SPACE_ID>.

      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(person:IfcPerson {Identification: "<PERSON_ID>"})

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace {Name: "<SPACE_ID>"})

MATCH (category:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Systems"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)

question_text: Which service orders were scheduled before they were even issued?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(event:IfcEvent),
      (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND event.EventOccurenceTime IS NOT NULL
  AND date(tt.ScheduleStart) < date(event.EventOccurenceTime)

RETURN task.Identification AS TaskID, tt.ScheduleStart AS ScheduledStart, event.EventOccurenceTime AS IssuedDate

question_text: What is the billing date for entry <COST_ITEM_ID> in work order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem {Identification: "<COST_ITEM_ID>"})

MATCH (ci)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

RETURN date(prop.NominalValue) AS BillingDate

question_text: What system-related classifications are assigned to work order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})-[:HasAssociations]->(assoc:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)-[:RelatingClassification]->(ref:IfcClassificationReference)-[:ReferencedSource]->(systems:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Systems"})
RETURN DISTINCT ref.Name

question_text: Testing and assessment is part of which task high-level category?
reference_answer:
MATCH (child:IfcClassificationReference)-[:ReferencedSource]->(parent:IfcClassificationReference)-[:ReferencedSource]->(toplevelcategory:IfcClassificationReference)
WHERE toLower(child.Name) = "testing and assessment"
RETURN toplevelcategory.Name

question_text: How many hours had additional premium pay in service order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(premium:IfcCostValue {Name: "ShiftPremium"}),
            (costItem)-[:HasCostValue]->(hours:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})
WHERE premium.AppliedValue > 0

RETURN SUM(hours.AppliedValue) AS HoursWithPremium

question_text: Which organizations had tasks with billing delays exceeding 20 days in 2022?
reference_answer:
MATCH (org:IfcOrganization)-[:Engages]->(pno:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:IsActingUpon]->(actor:IfcActor)
      -[:IsActingUpon]->(relActor:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart >= datetime("2022-01-01T00:00:00") AND tt.ScheduleStart < datetime("2023-01-01T00:00:00")

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(assignToSchedule:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(assignToCost:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
      (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH org.Name AS Organization,
     duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
WHERE delay.days > 20
RETURN DISTINCT Organization

question_text: List work orders created in September 2022 but started in February 2023.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(event:IfcEvent),
      (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE event.EventOccurenceTime IS NOT NULL AND tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL
  AND date(event.EventOccurenceTime).year = 2022
  AND date(event.EventOccurenceTime).month = 9
  AND date(tt.ScheduleStart).year = 2023
  AND date(tt.ScheduleStart).month = 2

RETURN task.Identification AS TaskID, event.EventOccurenceTime AS Issued, tt.ScheduleStart AS ScheduledStart

question_text: List the administrative order types used for safety-related work orders within building <BUILDING_ID>.

      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(:IfcClassificationReference)

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

MATCH (task)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(orderType:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "OrderType"})

RETURN DISTINCT orderType.NominalValue AS SafetyOrderTypes

question_text: For each task assigned to Locksmiths in building <BUILDING_ID>, list the space and scheduled time.

      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)

      -[:RelatingObject]->(:IfcBuildingStorey)

question_text: Which work center received the most assignments in 2022?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(time:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE date(time.ScheduleStart).year = 2022

MATCH (wcRoot:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Work Centers"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..1]->(wc:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task)

RETURN wc.Name AS WorkCenter, COUNT(*) AS Count
ORDER BY Count DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: Is the aggregate time spent on 'Door, Window, Hardware' higher than that for 'Ceiling and Flooring'
reference_answer:
MATCH (door:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Door, Window, Hardware"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf1:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task1:IfcTask)
MATCH (task1)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci1:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv1:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

WITH SUM(cv1.AppliedValue) AS doorHours

MATCH (ceil:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Ceiling and Flooring"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf2:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task2:IfcTask)
MATCH (task2)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci2:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv2:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

WITH doorHours, SUM(cv2.AppliedValue) AS ceilHours
RETURN doorHours, ceilHours,
       CASE 
         WHEN doorHours > ceilHours THEN "Doors/Windows have more billed hours"
         WHEN ceilHours > doorHours THEN "Ceiling/Flooring has more billed hours"
         ELSE "Both categories have equal billed hours"
       END AS Result

question_text: Which planner had the slowest average billing process for Security and Access tasks in 2023?
reference_answer:
MATCH (category:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Security and Access"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart.year = 2023

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
      (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

MATCH (task)-[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(planner:IfcPerson)

WITH planner.GivenName + " " + planner.FamilyName AS Planner,
     duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
RETURN Planner, round(avg(delay.days), 1) AS AvgBillingDelay
ORDER BY AvgBillingDelay DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: Are there any 'Lighting Issues' work orders located on the second floor of building <BUILDING_ID>?

      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)

MATCH (building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey {Name: <STOREY_ID>})
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)

question_text: What building floors have service orders assigned to steamfitters?

      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)

question_text: Give the path from a storey to its spaces.
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcBuildingStorey -[:IsDecomposedBy]-> IfcRelAggregates -[:RelatedObjects]-> IfcSpace" AS Path

question_text: Which planner has the shortest average delay between work and billing?
reference_answer:
MATCH (person:IfcPerson)
MATCH (person)-[:EngagedIn]->(pno:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
MATCH (pno)-[:IsActingUpon]->(actor:IfcActor)
MATCH (actor)-[:IsActingUpon]->(relActor:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
MATCH (relActor)-[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(assignSchedule:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
MATCH (assignSchedule)-[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)
MATCH (schedule)-[:Controls]->(assignCost:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
MATCH (assignCost)-[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(relDef:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
MATCH (relDef)-[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
MATCH (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"})
MATCH (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH person.GivenName + " " + person.FamilyName AS Planner,
     duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
RETURN Planner, round(avg(delay.days), 1) AS AvgBillingDelay
ORDER BY AvgBillingDelay ASC
LIMIT 5

question_text: What is the first name of the planner with ID <PERSON_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (p:IfcPerson {Identification: "<PERSON_ID>"})
RETURN p.GivenName

question_text: How many hours were billed in total for work order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(assignToSchedule:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(assignItems:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

RETURN SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalHours

question_text: How has the frequency of noise and sound tasks changed year over year?
reference_answer:
MATCH (category:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Noise and Sound"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(time:IfcTaskTime)

WITH date(time.ScheduleStart).year AS Year, count(task) AS TaskCount
RETURN Year, TaskCount
ORDER BY Year

question_text: Are there tasks where billing happened before scheduling?
reference_answer:

MATCH (task)

      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(billing:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE billing.Name = "BillingDate"

WITH task.Identification AS TaskID,
     tt.ScheduleStart AS ScheduleStart,
     billing.NominalValue AS BillingDate
WHERE date(BillingDate) < date(ScheduleStart)

RETURN TaskID, ScheduleStart, BillingDate

question_text: Which month experienced the largest month-to-month increase in emergency work orders?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(p:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE p.Name = "Priority" AND p.NominalValue = "<PRIORITY_LABEL>"

MATCH (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

WITH apoc.date.format(datetime(tt.ScheduleStart).epochMillis, "ms", "yyyy-MM") AS month, COUNT(*) AS Emergencies
WITH collect({month: month, count: Emergencies}) AS data
WITH [i IN range(1, size(data)-1) | 
      {month: data[i].month, spike: data[i].count - data[i-1].count}] AS diffs
UNWIND diffs AS row
RETURN row.month AS Month, row.spike AS Spike
ORDER BY Spike DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: Which tasks were scheduled during the same week as task <WORK_ORDER_ID>?

WITH date(refTime.ScheduleStart) AS refDate

MATCH (task:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(time:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE date(time.ScheduleStart).year = refDate.year
  AND date(time.ScheduleStart).week = refDate.week
  AND task.Identification <> "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"

RETURN DISTINCT task.Identification AS WorkOrderID

question_text: Has total billing volume increased year-over-year without any declines?
reference_answer:
MATCH (:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"}),
      (cv)-[:IsCostValueOf]->(:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE bd.Name = "BillingDate"

WITH date(bd.NominalValue).year AS year, SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS total
ORDER BY year
WITH collect(total) AS yearlyTotals
RETURN ALL(i IN range(1, size(yearlyTotals)-1) WHERE yearlyTotals[i] > yearlyTotals[i-1]) AS HasSteadyGrowth

            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH category.Name AS Category, duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
RETURN Category, round(avg(delay.days), 1) AS AvgBillingDelay

question_text: Identify 'High-Impact' revenue leaks: Find tasks in <BUILDING_ID> that have generated zero revenue ('TotalCharged' = 0) despite incurring a 'TotalPaid' cost that is more than double the building's average task cost. Return the Task ID, the incurred Cost, and the building's Average Cost.
reference_answer:
MATCH (b:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})
CALL {
    WITH b
    MATCH (b)<-[:RelatingObject]-(agg1:IfcRelAggregates)
          -[:Decomposes]->(st:IfcBuildingStorey)
          <-[:RelatingObject]-(agg2:IfcRelAggregates)
          -[:Decomposes]->(sp:IfcSpace)
          <-[:RelatedObjects]-(proc:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
          -[:RelatingProcess]->(t:IfcTask)
    
    MATCH (t)-[:HasAssignments]->(rc1:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
          -[:RelatingControl]->(sch:IfcCostSchedule)
          -[:Controls]->(rc2:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
          -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem)
          -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})
          
    RETURN avg(cv.AppliedValue) AS AvgBuildingCost
}


MATCH (task:IfcTask)-[:OperatesOn]->(relProc:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(relAggA:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(relAggB:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(b)


MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(relControlA:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(sched:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(relControlB:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (item)-[:HasCostValue]->(cvPaid:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})
MATCH (item)-[:HasCostValue]->(cvCharged:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalCharged"})
WITH task, cvPaid.AppliedValue AS Cost, cvCharged.AppliedValue AS Revenue, AvgBuildingCost
WHERE Revenue = 0 
  AND Cost > (AvgBuildingCost * 2)

RETURN task.Identification AS LeakTask, Cost, AvgBuildingCost

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(assignToSchedule:IfcRelAssignsToControl)

question_text: Which building is service order <WORK_ORDER_ID> linked to?

      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding)

RETURN building.Name AS BuildingName

question_text: Identify the planner who has managed tasks across the highest number of distinct 'Work Center' trades.
reference_answer:
MATCH (p:IfcPerson)
      <-[:ThePerson]-(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      <-[:TheActor]-(:IfcActor)
      <-[:RelatingActor]-(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      <-[:IsRelatedBy]-(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (cat:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Work Centers"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task)

RETURN p.GivenName + " " + p.FamilyName AS Planner, count(DISTINCT leaf.Name) AS DistinctTrades
ORDER BY DistinctTrades DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: Find all work orders where the recorded 'BillingDate' is earlier than the 'WorkDate.'
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WHERE date(bd.NominalValue) < date(wd.NominalValue)

RETURN task.Identification AS TaskID, date(wd.NominalValue) AS WorkDate, date(bd.NominalValue) AS BillingDate

question_text: What is the latest billing date recorded under work order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (ci)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

RETURN max(date(prop.NominalValue)) AS LatestBillingDate

question_text: What is the average pay rate across all billing records?
reference_answer:
MATCH (value:IfcCostValue {Name: "PayRate"})
RETURN AVG(value.AppliedValue) AS AvgPayRate

question_text: Give the range of billing hours in total.
reference_answer:
MATCH (value:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})
RETURN MAX(value.AppliedValue) - MIN(value.AppliedValue) AS HoursRange

question_text: What fraction of completed tasks in building <BUILDING_ID> were classified as emergency?
reference_answer:
MATCH (space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

MATCH (space)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)
WHERE task.Status = "<TASK_STATUS>"

OPTIONAL MATCH (task)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(priority:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "Priority"})

WITH
  COUNT(*) AS totalCompleted,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN priority.NominalValue = "<PRIORITY_LABEL>" THEN 1 END) AS emergencyCount

RETURN 
  CASE WHEN totalCompleted = 0 THEN 0.0
       ELSE toFloat(emergencyCount) / totalCompleted * 100
  END AS EmergencyPercentage

question_text: Are there any spaces that are not linked to any work order?
What is the path from a work order to its organization?
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcTask -[:IsRelatedBy]-> IfcRelAssignsToActor -[:RelatingActor]-> IfcActor -[:TheActor]-> IfcPersonAndOrganization -[:TheOrganization]-> IfcOrganization" AS Path

question_text: What is the service execution date for entry <COST_ITEM_ID> in service order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem {Identification: "<COST_ITEM_ID>"})

MATCH (ci)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"})

RETURN date(prop.NominalValue) AS WorkDate

question_text: What is the minimum chargeout rate recorded?

MATCH (value:IfcCostValue {Name: "ChargeoutRate"})
RETURN MIN(value.AppliedValue) AS MinChargeoutRate

question_text: Count the hours with non-zero premium applied in work order <WORK_ORDER_ID>.
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(premium:IfcCostValue {Name: "ShiftPremium"}),
            (costItem)-[:HasCostValue]->(hours:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})
WHERE premium.AppliedValue > 0

RETURN SUM(hours.AppliedValue) AS HoursWithPremium

question_text: Which planner’s tasks classified as Electrical Systems were billed most promptly in 2021?
reference_answer:
MATCH (category:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Electrical Systems"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart.year = 2021

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
      (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

MATCH (task)-[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(planner:IfcPerson)

WITH planner.GivenName + " " + planner.FamilyName AS Planner,
     duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
RETURN Planner, round(avg(delay.days), 1) AS AvgBillingDelay
ORDER BY AvgBillingDelay ASC
LIMIT 1

question_text: List tasks with over $300 cost, assigned to the same planner, and located in building <BUILDING_ID>.
reference_answer:
MATCH (planner:IfcPerson)
      -[:EngagedIn]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:IsActingUpon]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:IsActingUpon]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})

WITH task, planner, building, sum(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalPaid
WHERE TotalPaid > 300

RETURN DISTINCT 
       task.Identification AS TaskID,
       planner.GivenName + " " + planner.FamilyName AS Planner,
       building.Name AS Building,
       TotalPaid

question_text: List pairs of same-category work orders that were scheduled on the same floor with less than a day's gap.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task1:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(tt1:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt1.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

MATCH (task2:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(tt2:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt2.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND task1 <> task2


MATCH (task1)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)-[:RelatedObjects]->(space1:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)-[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)

MATCH (task2)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)-[:RelatedObjects]->(space2:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)-[:RelatingObject]->(storey)


MATCH (task1)-[:HasAssociations]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)-[:RelatingClassification]->(class1:IfcClassificationReference)
MATCH (task2)-[:HasAssociations]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)-[:RelatingClassification]->(class2:IfcClassificationReference)

WHERE class1.Name = class2.Name


AND abs(duration.inDays(date(tt1.ScheduleStart), date(tt2.ScheduleStart)).days) <= 1

RETURN DISTINCT storey.Name AS Storey,
       class1.Name AS Classification,
       task1.Identification AS TaskA,
       task2.Identification AS TaskB,
       tt1.ScheduleStart AS StartA,
       tt2.ScheduleStart AS StartB
ORDER BY Storey, StartA

question_text: Which OrderType is associated with the work order having the highest 'TotalPaid' value?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "OrderType"}) 

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})

RETURN prop.NominalValue AS OrderType, cv.AppliedValue AS Cost
ORDER BY Cost DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: Which high-priority tasks were scheduled on fifth floors in 2022?

question_text: What is the earliest billing date for service order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:

      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem)

      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)

question_text: What is the most frequent classification type in room <SPACE_ID>?

ORDER BY Frequency DESC

question_text: What is the average duration of tasks in building <BUILDING_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(time:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE time.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND time.ScheduleFinish IS NOT NULL

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

WITH duration.between(date(time.ScheduleStart), date(time.ScheduleFinish)) AS d
RETURN avg(d.days) AS AvgTaskDurationInDays

question_text: In which section is moving and delivery categorized?
reference_answer:
MATCH (child:IfcClassificationReference)-[:ReferencedSource]->(parent:IfcClassificationReference)
WHERE toLower(child.Name) = "moving and delivery"

question_text: What kind of temporal data is stored in IfcTaskTime?

MATCH (t:IfcTaskTime)

LIMIT 1

question_text: How many cost items were billed in a different calendar year than their working date.
reference_answer:
MATCH (costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE wd.Name = "WorkDate"

MATCH (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE bd.Name = "BillingDate"

WITH date(wd.NominalValue) AS wd_date, date(bd.NominalValue) AS bd_date
WHERE wd_date.year <> bd_date.year
RETURN COUNT(*) AS NumCrossYearCostItems

question_text: What detailed action labels are included in the Actions and Issues hierarchy?

MATCH (root:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Actions And Issues"})
      -[:HasReferences]->(mid:IfcClassificationReference)
