RETURN DISTINCT leaf.Name

question_text: Give me the range between the first and last billing date for WO <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (ci)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH date(prop.NominalValue) AS wd
RETURN duration.between(min(wd), max(wd)).days AS BillingDateRangeInDays

question_text: Any service orders assigned to both “Plumbers” and “Electricians” simultaneously?
reference_answer:

      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf1:IfcClassificationReference)

      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf2:IfcClassificationReference)

question_text: What time-based information is part of a billing record?
reference_answer:
MATCH (:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE prop.Name CONTAINS "Date" OR prop.Name CONTAINS "Time"
RETURN DISTINCT prop.Name AS TimeBasedFields

question_text: Which tasks with PMActivity <PMActivity> were assigned to <GIVEN_NAME> <FAMILY_NAME>?

MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(pm:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "PMActivity"})
WHERE pm.NominalValue = "<PMActivity>"

MATCH (task)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(person:IfcPerson)
WHERE person.GivenName = "<GIVEN_NAME>" AND person.FamilyName = "<FAMILY_NAME>"

RETURN DISTINCT task.Identification AS WorkOrderID

question_text: What is the least charged amount?

question_text: What values contribute to the final amount charged in a cost entry?

MATCH (charged)-[:HasComponents]->(operand:IfcCostValue)
RETURN DISTINCT 
  charged.Name AS RootName,
  charged.ArithmeticOperator AS RootOperator,
  operand.Name AS OperandName

question_text: Among water-steam flow issues work orders, how long does it typically take for billing to occur?

      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)

      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),

WITH duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay

question_text: Are there rooms with assigned tasks but no classification?
reference_answer:
CALL {
  MATCH (space:IfcSpace)
        -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
        -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)
  WHERE NOT EXISTS {
    MATCH (task)
          -[:HasAssociations]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
          -[:RelatingClassification]->(:IfcClassificationReference)
  }
  RETURN collect({Name: space.Name, ID: space.GlobalId}) AS Spaces
}
RETURN 
  CASE 
    WHEN size(Spaces) > 0 THEN true
    ELSE false
  END AS HasUnclassifiedTasks,
  Spaces

      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)

RETURN toUpper(p.NominalValue) = "<UserStatus>" AS IsUserStatusSETC

question_text: Find all actors who consistently had their tasks billed within 7 days of the work date.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
  -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
  -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
  -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
  -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
  -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
  -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
        (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

MATCH (task)-[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
  -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
  -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
  -[:ThePerson]->(planner:IfcPerson)

WITH planner.Identification AS PlannerID,
     duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
WITH PlannerID, collect(delay.days) AS Delays
WITH PlannerID, Delays
WHERE all(d IN Delays WHERE d <= 7)

WITH collect({PlannerID: PlannerID, Count: size(Delays)}) AS Results
RETURN size(Results) > 0 AS Exists, Results

question_text: List all billing items that were billed more than 20 days after the work date.
reference_answer:
MATCH (costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH costItem, duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
WHERE delay.days > 20
RETURN costItem.Identification AS CostItemID, delay.days AS DelayInDays
ORDER BY delay.days DESC

question_text: Which room had the most unique types of tasks across all years?
reference_answer:

      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssociations]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatingClassification]->(cls:IfcClassificationReference)

MATCH (:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Actions And Issues"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(cls)

WITH space.Name AS Room, collect(DISTINCT cls.Name) AS Issues
RETURN Room, size(Issues) AS UniqueIssues, Issues AS Issue
ORDER BY UniqueIssues DESC

question_text: What’s the median number of days between the creation of a work order and its scheduled start date?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(event:IfcEvent),
      (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE event.EventOccurenceTime IS NOT NULL AND tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

WITH duration.inDays(date(event.EventOccurenceTime), date(tt.ScheduleStart)).days AS delayDays
WHERE delayDays >= 0

RETURN percentileCont(delayDays, 0.5) AS MedianDelayInDays

question_text: How are Control Technicians tasks distributed across buildings?

      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)

      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding)

RETURN building.Name AS BuildingName, COUNT(DISTINCT task) AS TaskCount
ORDER BY PlumbingTaskCount DESC

question_text: What systems are most frequently affected in each building?
reference_answer:
MATCH (building:IfcBuilding)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (category:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Systems"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..1]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task)

RETURN building.Name AS Building, leaf.Name AS System, COUNT(*) AS Count
ORDER BY Building, Count DESC

question_text: Which distribution channel is associated with the most expensive WO?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(channel:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "DistributionChannel"})

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})

WITH channel.NominalValue AS Channel, SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalPaid
RETURN Channel, TotalPaid
ORDER BY TotalPaid DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: What is the range of charged amounts in the dataset?
reference_answer:
MATCH (value:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalCharged"})
RETURN MAX(value.AppliedValue) - MIN(value.AppliedValue) AS TotalChargedRange

question_text: Are there any moving and delivery tasks billed more than 30 days after the work was done?
reference_answer:
MATCH (class:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Moving and Delivery"})
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH task.Identification AS TaskID, duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
WHERE delay.days > 30
RETURN TaskID, delay.days AS BillingDelayDays
ORDER BY BillingDelayDays DESC

question_text: Sum up the hours recorded in the billings for wo <WORK_ORDER_ID>.
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(assignToSchedule:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(assignItems:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

RETURN SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalHours

question_text: How many WOs marked with UserStatus “<UserStatus>” occurred in 2023?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "UserStatus"})
WHERE prop.NominalValue CONTAINS "<UserStatus>"

MATCH (task)-[:TaskTime]->(time:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE date(time.ScheduleStart).year = 2023

RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT task) AS SETCTaskCountIn2023

question_text: Which WOs issued in 2022 finished in 2023?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(event:IfcEvent),
      (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE event.EventOccurenceTime IS NOT NULL AND tt.ScheduleFinish IS NOT NULL
  AND date(event.EventOccurenceTime).year = 2022
  AND date(tt.ScheduleFinish).year = 2023

RETURN task.Identification AS TaskID, event.EventOccurenceTime AS Issued, tt.ScheduleFinish AS Finished

question_text: Which mechanical category required more labor: Chillers and Boilers or HVAC and AC?
reference_answer:
MATCH (boiler:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Chillers and Boilers"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf1:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task1:IfcTask)
MATCH (task1)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci1:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv1:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

WITH SUM(cv1.AppliedValue) AS boilerHours

MATCH (hvac:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "HVAC and AC"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf2:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task2:IfcTask)
MATCH (task2)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci2:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv2:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

WITH boilerHours, SUM(cv2.AppliedValue) AS hvacHours
RETURN boilerHours, hvacHours,
       CASE 
         WHEN boilerHours > hvacHours THEN "Chillers and Boilers have more billed hours"
         WHEN hvacHours > boilerHours THEN "HVAC and AC has more billed hours"
         ELSE "Both categories have equal billed hours"
       END AS Result

question_text: Which service order had the longest delay between labor and billing?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH task,
     datetime(wd.NominalValue) AS workDate,
     datetime(bd.NominalValue) AS billingDate,
     duration.inDays(datetime(wd.NominalValue), datetime(bd.NominalValue)).days AS delay

WHERE delay IS NOT NULL

RETURN task.Identification AS TaskID,
       delay AS DelayInDays
ORDER BY DelayInDays DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: Do all urgent tasks involve less than 5 billed hours?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "Priority"})
WHERE prop.NominalValue = "<PRIORITY_LABEL>"

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

WITH task, cv.AppliedValue AS hours
RETURN COUNT(*) = COUNT(CASE WHEN hours < 5 THEN 1 END) AS AllUrgentTasksUnder5Hours

question_text: List planners who have managed a high volume of work (>20 tasks) within a single month.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(planner:IfcPerson)

MATCH (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

WITH planner.FamilyName + " " + planner.GivenName AS PlannerName,
     apoc.date.format(datetime(tt.ScheduleStart).epochMillis, "ms", "yyyy-MM") AS Month,
     count(*) AS TaskCount
WHERE TaskCount > 50

RETURN PlannerName, Month, TaskCount
ORDER BY TaskCount DESC

question_text: How many tasks in building <BUILDING_ID> were billed more than 10 days after execution?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
  -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
  -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
  -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
  -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
  -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
  -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
  -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
  -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
  -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
  -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
  -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
       (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH task.Identification AS TaskID,
     duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
WHERE delay.days > 10
RETURN count(TaskID) AS LateBilledTasks

question_text: Does a billing entry include any time or date fields?

question_text: What’s the average time between issuance and start of work for tasks in building <BUILDING_ID>?

      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(relAgg1:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(relAgg2:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(assignProc:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)

MATCH (event:IfcEvent)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task)

WHERE tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND event.EventOccurenceTime IS NOT NULL

WITH duration.inDays(date(event.EventOccurenceTime), date(tt.ScheduleStart)) AS delay
RETURN avg(delay) AS AvgDaysToStart

question_text: How many spaces are on each floor of building <BUILDING_ID>?

question_text: Do tasks handled by Electricians cost more on average than those handled by Carpenters?
reference_answer:
MATCH (cls1:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Electricians"})
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task1:IfcTask)
MATCH (task1)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item1:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv1:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})
WITH avg(cv1.AppliedValue) AS electricianAvg

MATCH (cls2:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Carpenters"})
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task2:IfcTask)
MATCH (task2)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item2:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv2:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})
WITH electricianAvg, avg(cv2.AppliedValue) AS carpenterAvg
RETURN electricianAvg > carpenterAvg AS ElectriciansCostMore

question_text: What is the total amount charged for work orders planned by <GIVEN_NAME> <FAMILY_NAME> in building <BUILDING_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(person:IfcPerson)
WHERE person.GivenName = "<GIVEN_NAME>" AND person.FamilyName = "<FAMILY_NAME>"

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalCharged"})

RETURN SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalCharged

question_text: On which date was <COST_ITEM_ID> carried out in work order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem {Identification: "<COST_ITEM_ID>"})

MATCH (ci)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"})

RETURN date(prop.NominalValue) AS WorkDate

question_text: What is the distribution channel used most frequently across all WOs?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "DistributionChannel"})
RETURN prop.NominalValue AS DistributionChannel, COUNT(*) AS Count
ORDER BY Count DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: Identify 'High-Burn' floors in <BUILDING_ID> where the total maintenance cost exceeds $10,000 but the total recorded labor hours are less than 50. Return the Floor Name and the 'Cost Per Hour' ratio.
reference_answer:
MATCH (b:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})
      <-[:RelatingObject]-(relAgg1:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:Decomposes]-(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      <-[:RelatingObject]-(relAgg2:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:Decomposes]-(space:IfcSpace)
      <-[:RelatedObjects]-(relProc:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:OperatesOn]-(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(relControl1:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(sched:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(relControl2:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cvPaid:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})

MATCH (item)-[:HasCostValue]->(cvHours:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

WITH storey, sum(cvPaid.AppliedValue) AS FloorTotalCost, sum(cvHours.AppliedValue) AS FloorTotalHours

WHERE FloorTotalCost > 10000 AND FloorTotalHours < 50

RETURN storey.Name AS FloorName, 
       FloorTotalCost, 
       FloorTotalHours, 
       (FloorTotalCost / FloorTotalHours) AS BurnRate
ORDER BY BurnRate DESC

question_text: Sum up the hours recorded for tasks managed by <PERSON_ID> in building <BUILDING_ID>.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(person:IfcPerson {Identification: "<PERSON_ID>"})

MATCH (task)
      -[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

RETURN SUM(cv.AppliedValue) AS TotalHours

question_text: List all service orders created by MPG <PERSON_ID> that involved more than 3 billed hours.
reference_answer:

      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(person:IfcPerson {Identification: "<PERSON_ID>"})

MATCH (task)

      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)

WHERE cv.AppliedValue > 3

question_text: calculate the avg chargeout rate for the cost records of the service order <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "ChargeoutRate"})

RETURN AVG(cv.AppliedValue) AS AvgChargeoutRate

question_text: What is the total of all pay rates?
reference_answer:
MATCH (value:IfcCostValue {Name: "PayRate"})
RETURN SUM(value.AppliedValue) AS SumPayRate

question_text: How has the average delay between work and billing changed over time?
reference_answer:
MATCH (costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet),
      (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue),
      (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE wd.Name = "WorkDate" AND bd.Name = "BillingDate"

WITH date(wd.NominalValue) AS workDate, date(bd.NominalValue) AS billDate
WITH workDate.year AS year, duration.inDays(workDate, billDate).days AS delay
WITH year, avg(delay) AS avgDelay
ORDER BY year
RETURN year, avgDelay

question_text: Are there any actors whose tasks were always billed within 7 days?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
  -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
  -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
  -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
  -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (costItem)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
  -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
  -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
        (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

MATCH (task)-[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
  -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
  -[:TheActor]->(:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
  -[:ThePerson]->(planner:IfcPerson)

WITH planner.Identification AS PlannerID,
     duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
WITH PlannerID, collect(delay.days) AS Delays
WITH PlannerID, Delays
WHERE all(d IN Delays WHERE d <= 7)

WITH collect({PlannerID: PlannerID, Count: size(Delays)}) AS Results
RETURN size(Results) > 0 AS Exists, Results

question_text: Are there tasks with paid amount less than 20$ but high priority?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(priority:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "Priority"})

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "TotalPaid"})

WHERE toFloat(cv.AppliedValue) < 20 AND priority.NominalValue IN ["<PRIORITY_LABEL>", "<PRIORITY_LABEL>", "<PRIORITY_LABEL>"]

RETURN task.Identification AS WorkOrderID, priority.NominalValue AS Priority

question_text: Give me the range of shift premium (in total).
reference_answer:
MATCH (value:IfcCostValue {Name: "ShiftPremium"})
RETURN MAX(value.AppliedValue) - MIN(value.AppliedValue) AS ShiftPremiumRange

question_text: Which trigger type for creating WOs leads to the longest scheduled duration from start to finish?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(event:IfcEvent),
      (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL AND tt.ScheduleFinish IS NOT NULL

WITH event.UserDefinedEventTriggerType AS TriggerType,
     duration.inDays(date(tt.ScheduleStart), date(tt.ScheduleFinish)) AS taskDuration
RETURN TriggerType, avg(taskDuration) AS AvgDuration
ORDER BY AvgDuration DESC

WHERE toFloat(channel.NominalValue) = <DistributionChannel>

question_text: Are there work orders assigned to different actors with the same schedule and classification?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE tt.ScheduleStart IS NOT NULL

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssociations]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatingClassification]->(cls:IfcClassificationReference)

MATCH (task)-[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(pa1:IfcPersonAndOrganization)

WITH cls.Name AS Classification, tt.ScheduleStart AS ScheduleStart, collect(DISTINCT pa1) AS Actors
WHERE size(Actors) > 1

RETURN Classification, ScheduleStart, size(Actors) AS NumActors
ORDER BY NumActors DESC
LIMIT 10

question_text: What is the last name of the person whose first name is <GIVEN_NAME>?

MATCH (p:IfcPerson {GivenName: "<GIVEN_NAME>"})
RETURN p.FamilyName

question_text: Did shift premiums occur more often in the most recent year compared to the previous year?
reference_answer:
MATCH (:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv:IfcCostValue {Name: "ShiftPremium"})
MATCH (cv)-[:IsCostValueOf]->(:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue)
WHERE bd.Name = "BillingDate"

WITH date(bd.NominalValue).year AS year, count(*) AS num
WITH year, num
ORDER BY year DESC
LIMIT 2
WITH collect(num) AS counts
RETURN CASE 
         WHEN size(counts) = 2 AND counts[0] > counts[1] THEN true
         ELSE false
       END AS ShiftPremiumsIncreased

question_text: Compare the total billable hours recorded for electrical infrastructure versus water distribution piping.
reference_answer:
MATCH (elec:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Electrical Systems"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf1:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task1:IfcTask)
MATCH (task1)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci1:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv1:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

WITH SUM(cv1.AppliedValue) AS elecHours

MATCH (water:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Water Distribution"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf2:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task2:IfcTask)
MATCH (task2)-[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci2:IfcCostItem)
      -[:HasCostValue]->(cv2:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})

WITH elecHours, SUM(cv2.AppliedValue) AS waterHours
RETURN elecHours, waterHours,
       CASE 
         WHEN elecHours > waterHours THEN "Electrical Systems have more billed hours"
         WHEN waterHours > elecHours THEN "Water Distribution has more billed hours"
         ELSE "Both systems have equal billed hours"
       END AS Result

question_text: How many WOs were issued in one calendar year but completed in the next?
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)
      -[:IsRelatedBy]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(event:IfcEvent),
      (task)-[:TaskTime]->(tt:IfcTaskTime)
WHERE event.EventOccurenceTime IS NOT NULL AND tt.ScheduleFinish IS NOT NULL
  AND date(tt.ScheduleFinish).year > date(event.EventOccurenceTime).year

RETURN count(*) AS CrossYearCompletionCount

question_text: Which rooms had reported space comfort issues and also underwent HVAC system maintenance in the same month?

MATCH (comfortClass:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Space Comfort Issues"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(comfortTask:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(comfortTime:IfcTaskTime),
      
      (comfortTask)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)

MATCH (hvacClass:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "HVAC and AC"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(hvacTask:IfcTask)
      -[:TaskTime]->(hvacTime:IfcTaskTime),
      
      (hvacTask)-[:OperatesOn]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space)

WHERE date(comfortTime.ScheduleStart).year = date(hvacTime.ScheduleStart).year
  AND date(comfortTime.ScheduleStart).month = date(hvacTime.ScheduleStart).month

RETURN DISTINCT space.Name AS SpacesWithComfortAndHVAC

question_text: Which node type is used to store organizations?
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcOrganization" AS Entity

question_text: Find spaces that required work on ceilings or flooring in the same month that a leakage issue was reported.

      -[:RelatedObjects]->(leakTask:IfcTask)

      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ceilTask:IfcTask)

question_text: Tell me when task <WORK_ORDER_ID> was issues?

question_text: What work orders are assigned to room <SPACE_ID>?

question_text: How is the paid amount calculated in a billing record?
reference_answer:
MATCH (:IfcCostItem)-[:HasCostValue]->(totalpaid:IfcCostValue {Name:"TotalPaid"})-[:HasComponents]->(laborCost:IfcCostValue {Name: "LaborCost"})
MATCH (laborCost)-[:HasComponents]->(operand:IfcCostValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (operand)-[:HasComponents]->(leaf:IfcCostValue)
RETURN DISTINCT
  laborCost.Name AS RootName,
  laborCost.ArithmeticOperator AS RootOperator,
  operand.Name AS OperandName,
  operand.ArithmeticOperator AS OperandOperator,
  leaf.Name AS LeafOperandName

      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)

question_text: Which rooms are associated with the highest number of different order priorities?

      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)

question_text: Which classification category has the longest average billing delay across all entries?
reference_answer:
MATCH (root:IfcClassificationReference {Name: "Actions And Issues"})
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(category:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (task)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(costItem:IfcCostItem)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"}),
            (pset)-[:HasProperties]->(bd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

WITH category.Name AS Category, duration.inDays(date(wd.NominalValue), date(bd.NominalValue)) AS delay
RETURN Category, round(avg(delay.days), 1) AS AvgBillingDelay
ORDER BY AvgBillingDelay DESC
LIMIT 1

question_text: Which rooms belong to the storey <STOREY_ID>?

question_text: Identify 'Impossible Schedules' in <BUILDING_ID>: Find instances where a Planner authorized work in a single Room on a specific Date that cumulatively totaled more than 24 Hours of labor, yet the system recorded zero 'Shift Premium' (indicating a critical data integrity error). Return the Planner, Room, Date, and Total Hours.
reference_answer:
MATCH (task:IfcTask)


MATCH (task)-[:IsRelatedBy]->(relActor:IfcRelAssignsToActor)
      -[:RelatingActor]->(actor:IfcActor)
      -[:TheActor]->(pno:IfcPersonAndOrganization)
      -[:ThePerson]->(planner:IfcPerson)


MATCH (task)-[:OperatesOn]->(relProc:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:Decomposes]->(relAgg1:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:Decomposes]->(relAgg2:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatingObject]->(b:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})

MATCH (task)-[:HasAssignments]->(relControl:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(sched:IfcCostSchedule)
      -[:Controls]->(relControl2:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(item:IfcCostItem)

MATCH (item)-[:HasCostValue]->(cvHours:IfcCostValue {Name: "Hours"})
MATCH (item)-[:HasCostValue]->(cvPrem:IfcCostValue {Name: "Shift Premium"})
MATCH (item)-[:IsDefinedBy]->(relDef:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(pset:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(wd:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "WorkDate"})

WITH planner, space, wd.NominalValue AS Date, 
     sum(cvHours.AppliedValue) AS DailyHours, 
     sum(cvPrem.AppliedValue) AS DailyPremium

WHERE DailyHours > 24 AND DailyPremium = 0

RETURN planner.GivenName + " " + planner.FamilyName AS PlannerName, 
       space.Name AS Room, 
       Date, 
       DailyHours

RETURN storey.Name AS StoreyName, count(task) AS WorkOrderCount
ORDER BY StoreyName

question_text: What is the count of distinct work centers per floor in building <BUILDING_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)

MATCH (classificationRef:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:HasReferences*0..2]->(leaf:IfcClassificationReference)
      -[:ClassificationRefForObjects]->(:IfcRelAssociatesClassification)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(task)

WHERE classificationRef.Name = "Work Centers"

RETURN storey.Name AS Storey, COUNT(DISTINCT leaf.Name) AS DistinctWorkCenters
ORDER BY Storey

question_text: How is a storey linked to its building?
reference_answer: RETURN "IfcBuildingStorey -[:Decomposes]-> IfcRelAggregates -[:RelatingObject]-> IfcBuilding" AS Path

question_text: On what date was billing completed for cost item <COST_ITEM_ID> in task <WORK_ORDER_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (wo:IfcTask {Identification: "<WORK_ORDER_ID>"})
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatingControl]->(schedule:IfcCostSchedule)

MATCH (schedule)
      -[:Controls]->(:IfcRelAssignsToControl)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(ci:IfcCostItem {Identification: "<COST_ITEM_ID>"})

MATCH (ci)
      -[:IsDefinedBy]->(:IfcRelDefinesByProperties)
      -[:RelatingPropertyDefinition]->(:IfcPropertySet)
      -[:HasProperties]->(prop:IfcPropertySingleValue {Name: "BillingDate"})

RETURN date(prop.NominalValue) AS BillingDate

question_text: How many service orders are related to building <BUILDING_ID>?
reference_answer:
MATCH (building:IfcBuilding {Name: "<BUILDING_ID>"})
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(storey:IfcBuildingStorey)
      -[:IsDecomposedBy]->(:IfcRelAggregates)
      -[:RelatedObjects]->(space:IfcSpace)
      -[:HasAssignments]->(:IfcRelAssignsToProcess)
      -[:RelatingProcess]->(task:IfcTask)

RETURN count(task) AS WorkOrderCount
